Product: SheaMoisture Intensive Hydration Shampoo for Dry, Damaged Hair Manuka Honey and Mafura Oil Sulfate-Free 13 oz
Title: Synthetic fragrance.
Review: While this is supposed to be free from pretty much everything, it's not free from synthetic fragrance (parfum). This brand I have bought many times before and it was scented with essential oils. It does not disclose this on the website. Disappointed I wasted my time in ordering this. Synthetic fragrances trigger my wife's asthma.

Product: SheaMoisture Intensive Hydration Shampoo for Dry, Damaged Hair Manuka Honey and Mafura Oil Sulfate-Free 13 oz
Title: My original review was awesome
Review: Why exactly do companies CONSTANTLY have to change products that there is nothing wrong with.  I loved the first bottle it was thick creamy made my course dry thin hair feel amazing.  This last bottle(s) yep like an idiot I ordered 2 of them!!  So upset  I now have dry fuzzy hair again and thick and creamy went right out the window don't put too much of this in your hand or it will run right out and onto the shower floor.  The 1st bottle was amazing no product needed to finish hair after shower just pretty hair.  I never had scalp itch with the 1st bottle now my scalp itches constantly , way to go you saved some money,but you lost at least 1 customer in me.  It doesn't smell,feel or preform the same even my shoulders and back itch after the suds run over them after rinsing.  Do you know how long it took me to find a shampoo that worked this great.  You just don't know how upset I am.  My hair even feels thinner and I swear it is this shampoo.  I am going in search of another brand I can't even tell how much this stinks!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!

Product: SheaMoisture Intensive Hydration Shampoo for Dry, Damaged Hair Manuka Honey and Mafura Oil Sulfate-Free 13 oz
Title: Natural, budget-friendly and hydrating
Review: I have 3B curly hair and used this for about 6 months. In that time, I noticed by hair was well-hydrated and kept good curl definition. I didn't feel like it dried out my hair when I used it every other day. I will say that after 6 mos, my hair grew used to it and no longer felt silky soft after every use, but I still use this to take a break from my other more expensive shampoo.Other things I like about this:- natural, non-harmful ingredients- excellent priceI recommend this for anyone who prefers more natural products and needs to retain as much moisture in their hair as possible

Product: SheaMoisture Intensive Hydration Shampoo for Dry, Damaged Hair Manuka Honey and Mafura Oil Sulfate-Free 13 oz
Title: Two different formulations
Review: I've found that there are two different formulations of this shampoo. One has fragrance (essential oil blend) and the other has fragrance (parfum) which is also higher up on the list (i.e. more of it). I keep having to return the one with parfum--one from Target and this one from Amazon.

Product: SheaMoisture Intensive Hydration Shampoo for Dry, Damaged Hair Manuka Honey and Mafura Oil Sulfate-Free 13 oz
Title: Lathers well, smells great, free of most endocrine disrupting chemicals - but one huge concern...
Review: This product lathers well, smells great, and is free of most of the big offenders when it comes to endocrine disrupting chemicals.However, the product I got has "fragrance (parfum)" in it.  See the images attached to this review for proof. I had contacted the company in advance because I was concerned about this (per other reviews I saw), and they stated "The SheaMoisture Manuka Honey & Mafura Oil Intensive Hydration Shampoo is scented with an Essential oil blend. The product is the same if you purchase it from our website or amazon." Per their recommendation, I bought this product.But, their statement is just not true. I have to rate this product three stars because the company misled me and their product can contains fragrance (parfum), which is considered an "undisclosed mixture of various scent chemicals and ingredients that were used as fragrance dispersants ... such as diethyl phthalate".

Product: SheaMoisture Intensive Hydration Shampoo for Dry, Damaged Hair Manuka Honey and Mafura Oil Sulfate-Free 13 oz
Title: Smells great and moisturizing
Review: I bought this shampoo for my dry hair, and I love it! My entire family started using my bottle because it smells so great, so I had to purchase an additional bottle. It has made everyoneâ€™s hair feel and smell wonderful! Love that it is free of the bad stuff found in most shampoos. Worth the price for us.

Product: SheaMoisture Intensive Hydration Shampoo for Dry, Damaged Hair Manuka Honey and Mafura Oil Sulfate-Free 13 oz
Title: Moisturizing and long lasting
Review: I would recommend this shampoo for natural hair that is really dry. It leaves my hair really soft and easy to comb. It will last really long because it is thick and doesn't need a lot to work. After one use i was amazed at how little had gone from the bottle. My 2 bottles should last me the whole year

Product: SheaMoisture Intensive Hydration Shampoo for Dry, Damaged Hair Manuka Honey and Mafura Oil Sulfate-Free 13 oz
Title: Soft shiny hair, no chemicals to irritate the scalp
Review: I love that it is all natural. So many shampoos today have so many chemicals and they make my head itch or even get a rash. This product doesn't lather well, but as a hairstylist I know, its is still getting my scalp clean and moisturized! Lather doesn't mean clean it's the end result.... and my hair is soft and shiny with no conditioner!love this product

Product: SheaMoisture Intensive Hydration Shampoo for Dry, Damaged Hair Manuka Honey and Mafura Oil Sulfate-Free 13 oz
Title: Suds enough for me!
Review: This is my second purchase of this product. Although this doesn't suds up like market-bought shampoos, it sudsed quite sufficiently for me and leaves my hair feeling smooth - even before I use a conditioner. I think it actually helps my hair appear less frizzy as well -- a quality I really appreciate.

Product: SheaMoisture Intensive Hydration Shampoo for Dry, Damaged Hair Manuka Honey and Mafura Oil Sulfate-Free 13 oz
Title: Real quality
Review: I would highly recommend this product.  I have color treated hair and have had some issues with dryness and tangling.  After using this shampoo, conditioner and the intensive conditioner my hair is so full and less tangled, I can feel the added moisture too.

Product: SheaMoisture Intensive Hydration Shampoo for Dry, Damaged Hair Manuka Honey and Mafura Oil Sulfate-Free 13 oz
Title: Perfect!! Please never change!!!
Review: Good for your hair and you! My daughter got an app which allowed her to check the safety of common products that we use everyday. We were shocked at some of the ingredients in many of the mainstream shampoos and conditioners not to mention a long list of other products. We were in search of moisturizing shampoo and conditioner and decided to try this natural good for you brand. Let me just say WOW!!!! We are all in love with this brand!! It smells amazing, and it restores your hair to a shiny, soft, smooth and healthy texture! Iâ€™ve stated recommending it to everyone and buying it for gifts because thatâ€™s honestly how much I love it! I just did a huge skin care haul of this brand and made my mom a huge basket full of their products! She going through chemo for the second time and these products being healthy and natural while extremely moisturizing and pampering are absolutely perfect!! I feel great knowing that theyâ€™re all exactly what she needs while she can enjoy the luscious formulas and beautiful scents!!Thank you so much for the thoughtful care you put into these products!!

Product: SheaMoisture Intensive Hydration Shampoo for Dry, Damaged Hair Manuka Honey and Mafura Oil Sulfate-Free 13 oz
Title: Great!
Review: First, I started with the deep conditioner in this line. I was so amazed by how heavy and effective it was that I decided to try to layer every item in my hair, as I run out of my other products.This shampoo is lighter than I was expecting but that's fine. I wash twice (scalp then hair) and it's just as effective as my other shampoo.I'm not sure that its moisturizing effects linger because I layer on a lot of products. But I like using multiple players in the same line. It makes sense that they'd team up to have a greater impact.The scent is heavy - a hint of honey followed by an near-cologne scent. But I got used to it and don't smell it anymore.

Product: SheaMoisture Intensive Hydration Shampoo for Dry, Damaged Hair Manuka Honey and Mafura Oil Sulfate-Free 13 oz
Title: Possibly the Best Shampoo I've Ever Used
Review: I have been using Tresemme products for years.  I decided to try something different as my hair seemed to have lost its body.  I purchased SheaMoisture for two reasons:1.  The price was affordable2.  Description of ingredients and benefits of the productI am in love with SheaMoisture and I don't think I will be going back to Tresemme any time soon, if at all.I only use a tiny bit, less than a dime size, for a full head of lather.  The smell of the shampoo is divine, and lasts all day.  It rinses clean, I don't have to use any conditioner.  And my hair has so much body and fullness, and shines.Will be ordering this repeatedly.

Product: SheaMoisture Intensive Hydration Shampoo for Dry, Damaged Hair Manuka Honey and Mafura Oil Sulfate-Free 13 oz
Title: Find another shampoo that works.
Review: This is the worst shampoo I have used. The odor  is very unpleasant but I would deal with it if the product was good. I have to use three to four times the amount of my regular shampoo to wash my hair and my hair feels dry and stiff afterwards. Find another shampoo.

Product: SheaMoisture Intensive Hydration Shampoo for Dry, Damaged Hair Manuka Honey and Mafura Oil Sulfate-Free 13 oz
Title: Love it!
Review: After trying the "no poo" movement for a month (was using Loreal's Cleansing Balm), my hair was dry, frizzy, and frustrating. Wound up in a clip or ponytail every day because I couldn't stand to feel it frizzing all over my face and neck. I finally did some research and found that the "no poo" thing just doesn't work for everyone. Hair types, age, hormones, diet, and other factors all play into whether someone can go entirely without shampoo or not. And I can't!I had seen these products before, and heard them recommended by people, so I decided to give it a try. Today was my first use of this shampoo and the conditioner as well. First of all, it smells delicious! The shampoo lathers beautifully. My hair feels soft and healthy, my scalp isn't itching anymore.Win.

Product: SheaMoisture Intensive Hydration Shampoo for Dry, Damaged Hair Manuka Honey and Mafura Oil Sulfate-Free 13 oz
Title: Not as good as other Shea Moisture products
Review: Since I have dry hair, I was excited to see what this product could do for me. And it does give really nice curly, smooth pieces of hair.Unfortunately, it also leaves a really serious residue in my hair. This is shampoo; it's supposed to wash out. Instead it sticks to the underlayers of my hair and leaves my scalp looking greasy and unwashed. It's also not really "moisturized," more just... dry with residue. It's brittle and more difficult to brush.I tried more intense rinsing, less shampoo, different application... nothing really made this one work for me. Maybe if you've got 4A-4C hair like they recommend, but I've noticed 4A-4C people on this product mentioning the same problems.

Product: SheaMoisture Intensive Hydration Shampoo for Dry, Damaged Hair Manuka Honey and Mafura Oil Sulfate-Free 13 oz
Title: The worse product ever!!!!!
Review: Made my hair really brittle,dry and knotted up!!!!! I had to pay money for a hair dresser and have my hair cut...... And I had a wedding to be in and had to spend extra money due to this horrid product!!!!!!

Product: SheaMoisture Intensive Hydration Shampoo for Dry, Damaged Hair Manuka Honey and Mafura Oil Sulfate-Free 13 oz
Title: Great for dry hair
Review: I am 70, live in Phoenix, & have an autoimmune condition that causes dry hair, skin, & nails. In other words, I have 3 strikes against me in the dry hair dept. Also, my hair is waist length. I decided to switch shampoo because my hair was getting stinky (like BO) after a couple of days this summer. Because of my autoimmunity, I have to be careful about what personal care products I use. My tolerance for chemicals & scents is affected. The SheaMoisture shampoo & conditioner have been a perfect solution for me. The scents have not bothered me, & my hair is much softer. I still have to use Shea butter on the very ends of my hair, but this combo has made a big improvement in my hair.

Product: SheaMoisture Intensive Hydration Shampoo for Dry, Damaged Hair Manuka Honey and Mafura Oil Sulfate-Free 13 oz
Title: Love this product line; this shampoo smells great!
Review: Smells great AND also has great moisturizing properties. It's quite rich so you actually only need a small amount, pour carefully. It leaves my hair feeling soft and clean. I have naturally curly hair which tends to get dry very easily and requires LOTS of products to keep it tamed. I use mostly Shea Moisture products, everything from this shampoo to the mousse, leave-in conditioners, and moisturizing spritzes. I definitely recommend trying this product.

Product: SheaMoisture Intensive Hydration Shampoo for Dry, Damaged Hair Manuka Honey and Mafura Oil Sulfate-Free 13 oz
Title: Not the best Moisturizer
Review: I am going back to Creme of Naure with Honey. If this product moisturizes, then Creme of Nature with honey super moisturizes. I didn't feel this product had intensive hydration. I have a water filter on my showerhead, so I know it isn't the minerals in my water that doesn't make this work. I am back to Creme of Nature. I have the shampoo and conditioner. I will use it on wigs and hairpieces, it works well on them, just not my dry, frizzy, coarse hair.

Product: SheaMoisture Intensive Hydration Shampoo for Dry, Damaged Hair Manuka Honey and Mafura Oil Sulfate-Free 13 oz
Title: pretty decent
Review: iâ€™ve tried shea moisture before and it just never seemed to work for my 4c hair despite the positive reviews from people with my similar texture. but for some reason this shampoo just hit all the right spots.i used this as a moisturizing shampoo for my locs after i cleansed with trader joeâ€™s tea tree tingle shampoo and it was wonderful. of course itâ€™s not going to give you hydration a shampoo would, but it left my hair feeling a lot less stripped after cleansing.my hair is a big fan of honey so i was happy that my high hopes were met. hopefully this shampoo becomes a regular part of my wash day routine.the scent was a little strong at first, but you get used to if after a while if you arenâ€™t sensitive to smells.

Product: SheaMoisture Intensive Hydration Shampoo for Dry, Damaged Hair Manuka Honey and Mafura Oil Sulfate-Free 13 oz
Title: Absolutely Fantastic Product!!
Review: Overall, this shampoo has made my hair feeling really moisturized and clean. Something that I stand strongly about this product is that all the ingredients are natural. It makes me feel more secure on what I am using instead of all the chemicals that most brands add to their shampoo's and conditioners.Pros:-Smells very nice, not too strong of a scent.-Keeps my hair moisturized after use-Ingredients are natural-Healthy and shiny looking after useCons:-Doesn't foam (which wasn't a huge issue)-Need a decent amount of shampoo for application

Product: SheaMoisture Intensive Hydration Shampoo for Dry, Damaged Hair Manuka Honey and Mafura Oil Sulfate-Free 13 oz
Title: hope I can get a refund
Review: this makes me sad, as I love Minooka honey, but the shampoo is making my scalp itch and burn, and now my scalp is red.

Product: SheaMoisture Intensive Hydration Shampoo for Dry, Damaged Hair Manuka Honey and Mafura Oil Sulfate-Free 13 oz
Title: Decent for low porosity hair
Review: After completely destroying my hair with protein overload, I needed something that could moisturize my hair without being too heavy on the proteins. This does a way better job over the Curl & Shine line imo, as it is far less likely to weigh down 3b and 3a hair. I just wish this product did a better job at providing that hydration for longer.I'll always keep this around since it does work well, I just need something else to really keep my hair happy because the longer it can maintain moisture after fully drying, the better

Product: SheaMoisture Intensive Hydration Shampoo for Dry, Damaged Hair Manuka Honey and Mafura Oil Sulfate-Free 13 oz
Title: A pretty good shampoo
Review: I bought this shampoo to relieve my oily scalp and because it is sulfate free and has more natural ingredients. After use, it definitely made my hairâ€™s oil amount decrease and increased as well as extended the amount of days that my scalp is dry and free of oil. I will say though, this product made my scalp itch a bit but it was nothing too bad. My natural hair is about a 3a to a 3b (wavy/curly but not extremely curly) and this shampoo does a good job cleaning my scalp. I personally like the scent but I will say it is a bit strong, it smells very tart. This scent can easily be covered up with a leave in conditioner or a hair oil that is applied after showering. Overall, I enjoy this product!

Product: SheaMoisture Intensive Hydration Shampoo for Dry, Damaged Hair Manuka Honey and Mafura Oil Sulfate-Free 13 oz
Title: The product actually works on my granddaughter's ethnic hair and her rare beauty.
Review: The smell of the shampoo is like coconut . . . it reminds you of the tropics.  Callie is 6 years old and is a product of two wonderful races, but we did not know what to do with her hair!  It was a real challenge for us.  So we investigated and SHEA MOISTURE products gets to the ROOT of her hair with the shampoo.  A critical factor.  Now she just has ringlets.  She is amazing and tall and statuesque and BEAUTIFUL!!Woo-woo!  Thank you Amazon and SHEA MOISTURE PRODUCTS.

Product: SheaMoisture Intensive Hydration Shampoo for Dry, Damaged Hair Manuka Honey and Mafura Oil Sulfate-Free 13 oz
Title: An Absolute Disaster for 4C Natural Hair!
Review: I am so upset that I wasted my money on this shampoo that promises intense hydration and delivered the exact opposite. It completely destroyed my hair follices, creating a very rough texture and thousands of knots. Additionally it smells like a cheap, male cologne. Yuk. I also bought the conditioner in the same line which also further destroyed my hair texture. Wash day disaster! This product must be fake. Do not waste your money.

Product: SheaMoisture Intensive Hydration Shampoo for Dry, Damaged Hair Manuka Honey and Mafura Oil Sulfate-Free 13 oz
Title: Helped scalp itch and hair loss
Review: I have used a few times now and it has cut down on my itchy scalp...maybe hair loss (have long hair and am older)  I do not have dandruff but scalp has itched for last 10 years.  Hope this continues to help.

Product: SheaMoisture Intensive Hydration Shampoo for Dry, Damaged Hair Manuka Honey and Mafura Oil Sulfate-Free 13 oz
Title: A must buy
Review: So at first I wasn't too sure about this shampoo &Conditioner, when I was putting it on in the shower it seemed like they were doing much.I have been using this for over a month now and I AM ABSOUTELY IN LOVE with my hair now!! It has never been healthier, softer and as tangle free as it is now using these products! 10/10 reccomend!

Product: SheaMoisture Intensive Hydration Shampoo for Dry, Damaged Hair Manuka Honey and Mafura Oil Sulfate-Free 13 oz
Title: Great for coarse, dry, or damaged hair
Review: MENS HAIR REVIEW: This product is does a good job cleaning hair without removing too much of the natural oils. I wash with this about 1-2 times a week and condition on the days in between with the coconut/shea butter product from the same brand. I have a very dirty job and it gets everything out with about a tablespoon of product. Gave the scent a 4 only because it doesnâ€™t have much of a scent at all.  Not a big deal since the conditioner I use after has a great scent!!! If youâ€™re looking to go with natural ingredient products this is an affordable option with great results.

Product: SheaMoisture Intensive Hydration Shampoo for Dry, Damaged Hair Manuka Honey and Mafura Oil Sulfate-Free 13 oz
Title: Smells great and has natural ingredients.
Review: My wife uses this and just loves it. It is very moisture intensive, so if you have dry hair this may work. I used it on my hair and perhaps I used too much. It made my hair a bit too greasy. It would be great for someone with a dry or itchy scalp, or someone whose hair may be brittle. The ingredients are great, not filled with chemicals and mostly plant based. It smells good too. My wife has used several bottles and continues to enjoy it.

Product: SheaMoisture Intensive Hydration Shampoo for Dry, Damaged Hair Manuka Honey and Mafura Oil Sulfate-Free 13 oz
Title: the softness!!!!!
Review: Oh man I just used this shampoo along with the deep conditioner, it was a game changer!!! First my hair has unbelievable soft during the washing processing so I thought it wouldn't last once I rinsed it out but I was wrong then the deep conditioner it made detangling a breeze. I have medium short 4B and 4C low porosity

Product: SheaMoisture Intensive Hydration Shampoo for Dry, Damaged Hair Manuka Honey and Mafura Oil Sulfate-Free 13 oz
Title: Moisturizes well, contains no actual honey.
Review: This shampoo is VERY moisturizing. I used it every wash for about a week and now am alternating because it moisturizes a bit too well. I, like others, am confused about the label though. The ingredients list contains no actual Manuka Honey(or any honey for that matter) so it's a bit misleading. Still unsure if it's worth the price.

Product: SheaMoisture Intensive Hydration Shampoo for Dry, Damaged Hair Manuka Honey and Mafura Oil Sulfate-Free 13 oz
Title: Was excited but this product sucjs
Review: A LOT of residue left over on the hair. Never experienced this much left over residue.  Like so much it'll make my hair stiff after using it. Doesnt really fully wash off,  feels slimy on my neck/ ears after using it from the residue, have to use a crap ton just to even attempt to get any oils out. Hair gets greasy immediately. Weighs down your hair, so if you dont have much volume I wouldnt reccomend.  Only good thing about this product is that its sulfate free and doesnt irritate the scalp,  but that doesnt matter when it doesnt actually shampoo your hair. Get a dif product!

Product: SheaMoisture Intensive Hydration Shampoo for Dry, Damaged Hair Manuka Honey and Mafura Oil Sulfate-Free 13 oz
Title: Love this Shampoo
Review: I love this shampoo.  I find it's got a very nice scent, and it really moisturizes my dry, curly hair.  Reason I gave it 4 stars is because it was poorly packaged and it leaked over the other items I purchased.

Product: SheaMoisture Intensive Hydration Shampoo for Dry, Damaged Hair Manuka Honey and Mafura Oil Sulfate-Free 13 oz
Title: Smells like box dye / heavy chemical scent
Review: Iâ€™ve been using the conditioner and conditioning mask in the same scent and decided to order the shampoo as I adore the honey scent.I took a whif of the product while removing the safety seal and it smelt fine, but when I applied it in the shower it had a pungent chemical scent, literally smelt like box dye. Will not repurchase and I do not recommend.

Product: SheaMoisture Intensive Hydration Shampoo for Dry, Damaged Hair Manuka Honey and Mafura Oil Sulfate-Free 13 oz
Title: Crunchy Hair
Review: I tried this and the paired conditioner as a high moisture shampoo/conditioner as a replacement for the Devacurl Decadence line (made my scalp itchy). I have high porosity, 3b/3c curls that need a lot of moisture, so I thought for sure that this "intensive hydration" combo would be a good fit. Not the case, unfortunately. After the first use, my hair is crunchy, dry, and rough. Really bummed, but will be looking for other products.

Product: SheaMoisture Intensive Hydration Shampoo for Dry, Damaged Hair Manuka Honey and Mafura Oil Sulfate-Free 13 oz
Title: Great for curly, wavy hair
Review: The scent is heavenly and nothing has made my hair this nice, not even oil treatment, truly magical stuff.  I use the conditioner as well, they're both amazing and very affordable.  I'm a white woman with pretty wavy, curly hair and this stuff does the trick for me without any need for leave ins, I just use a little natural aloe for gel when needed.  Amazing product, please never discontinue!

Product: SheaMoisture Intensive Hydration Shampoo for Dry, Damaged Hair Manuka Honey and Mafura Oil Sulfate-Free 13 oz
Title: So sad
Review: I heard great things about sheamoisture so I decided to try it out. Unfortunately they changed the ingredients when they sold the company to dove and unilever. They added perfume to the ingredients which is completely overwhelming. Really dislike it will return and not buy anymore of their products going forward. Wish I could have tried them before the change :(

Product: SheaMoisture Intensive Hydration Shampoo for Dry, Damaged Hair Manuka Honey and Mafura Oil Sulfate-Free 13 oz
Title: This is clean and green,
Review: This has helped so much with my hair growing back, I was panicking because my hair is falling so much with this other shampoo I was using. I soon realized that the fragrance was irritating my scalp and causing scabs and hair to fall out. I found through the dirty app this shampoo it is rated clean and green. Decided to try it out and now Iâ€™m in love with this product <3

Product: SheaMoisture Intensive Hydration Shampoo for Dry, Damaged Hair Manuka Honey and Mafura Oil Sulfate-Free 13 oz
Title: Misleading, contains no Manuka honey.
Review: Label says Manuka Honey multiple times in the name, packaging, and description of the product, but once I received the bottle the ingredients list no honey whatsoever. I imagine this is why no ingredients are included on the product listing.

Product: SheaMoisture Intensive Hydration Shampoo for Dry, Damaged Hair Manuka Honey and Mafura Oil Sulfate-Free 13 oz
Title: Been using for years.
Review: I have used Shea Moisture shampoos for years. it works fine for me.

Product: SheaMoisture Intensive Hydration Shampoo for Dry, Damaged Hair Manuka Honey and Mafura Oil Sulfate-Free 13 oz
Title: Best shampoo for curls
Review: Love this super moisturizing shampoo,  works great on curly hair.

Product: SheaMoisture Intensive Hydration Shampoo for Dry, Damaged Hair Manuka Honey and Mafura Oil Sulfate-Free 13 oz
Title: Moisturizing, yes. Scalp does not like the product
Review: The product is definitely a bit moisturizing. I purchased the shampoo and conditioner, and have used them twice. But strangely, my scalp has been itching me since. I re-read the ingredients just to ensure that it was all natural. I cannot seem to put my finger on why this would be happening.

Product: SheaMoisture Intensive Hydration Shampoo for Dry, Damaged Hair Manuka Honey and Mafura Oil Sulfate-Free 13 oz
Title: Bad bottle
Review: There was no seal on the product, the cap was undone, and the bottle was covered in the sticky residue. I'm not sure if I should use

Product: SheaMoisture Intensive Hydration Shampoo for Dry, Damaged Hair Manuka Honey and Mafura Oil Sulfate-Free 13 oz
Title: Not as good as I hoped.
Review: It's okay but not anything spectacular. The scent is something to get used to, don't get it if you don't like the smell of cedar because this makes your hair smell strong like cedar. It really doesn't seem to make my hair any more soft and it doesn't seem to moisturize it but rather makes me have to wash my hair daily because the second day it's very greesy. Won't but again.

Product: SheaMoisture Intensive Hydration Shampoo for Dry, Damaged Hair Manuka Honey and Mafura Oil Sulfate-Free 13 oz
Title: So soft! Lathers great!
Review: I love this shampoo. I usually use the moisture retention one but this one lathers, cleanses, and makes my hair sooo soft way better. I like the smell of the moisture retention one better but this one is better in every other aspect for my hair. I have super thick tight curls (type 3c-4a).

Product: SheaMoisture Intensive Hydration Shampoo for Dry, Damaged Hair Manuka Honey and Mafura Oil Sulfate-Free 13 oz
Title: Loved this product
Review: Love this shampoo. I have sensitive skin, so I tried this since it doesnâ€™t have a lot of chemicals. Works great! Also, helped a lot with hydration and my hair is now much softer and has more brilliance.

Product: SheaMoisture Intensive Hydration Shampoo for Dry, Damaged Hair Manuka Honey and Mafura Oil Sulfate-Free 13 oz
Title: Lose lid equals lost product ðŸ˜”
Review: Seal was broken from bottle and stuck inside lid. The shampoo had leaked due to lid coming loose. It was all over protective air bags inside box. I knew as soon as I opened the box something smelled great. Wasn't happy to see it was the fact the shampoo had leaked inside the box.

Product: SheaMoisture Intensive Hydration Shampoo for Dry, Damaged Hair Manuka Honey and Mafura Oil Sulfate-Free 13 oz
Title: Great product
Review: Shea moisture canâ€™t be beat!  Use on my hair and my daughters hair!  Always leaves my hair feeling great.  Helps to manage our 4c hair!

Product: SheaMoisture Intensive Hydration Shampoo for Dry, Damaged Hair Manuka Honey and Mafura Oil Sulfate-Free 13 oz
Title: Worst Shampoo Ever !
Review: This stuff makes my hair so frizzy and tangled up. A lot of big knots throughout the day .Leaves my scalp itchy and dry !Will definitely not purchase again and not recommend at all !

Product: SheaMoisture Intensive Hydration Shampoo for Dry, Damaged Hair Manuka Honey and Mafura Oil Sulfate-Free 13 oz
Title: love this shampoo
Review: i dont even think this shampoo is for volumizing but it does the job well! my hair is so lively and soft. ive also gotten many complement on the scent of my hair! i highly recommend this shampoo

Product: SheaMoisture Intensive Hydration Shampoo for Dry, Damaged Hair Manuka Honey and Mafura Oil Sulfate-Free 13 oz
Title: Horrific, Clinging Odor
Review: Wow. This smells very strongly and I absolutely loathe the smell. It reminds me of cheap menâ€™s cologne and the smell lingers for days. Nothing else about this shampoo matters to me when I am constantly being harangued by a cloud of Hail NO. It goes in the trash

Product: SheaMoisture Intensive Hydration Shampoo for Dry, Damaged Hair Manuka Honey and Mafura Oil Sulfate-Free 13 oz
Title: Super good for dry hair

Product: SheaMoisture Intensive Hydration Shampoo for Dry, Damaged Hair Manuka Honey and Mafura Oil Sulfate-Free 13 oz
Title: From Desert to Rainforest.
Review: I had been using a co-wash (I won't name it) that I'd thought to be good. It made my hair look and feel great the day of, and day after washing. However, I began to notice after those two days, my hair and scalp were dry. Sahara desert dry. I'd oil my scalp and the dryness would ensue.I needed a change. I decided, after remembering success with previous She Moisture products, to give this line a try: It changed my life.My hair went from parched to lush. My curls are more defined. My follicles are silky and strengthened. The shine factor is on 100 (People have been asking me if I had my hair dyed).Suffice it to say, this will be my go-to line of hair products. It works for me. The price is right. And it smells amazing.

Product: SheaMoisture Intensive Hydration Shampoo for Dry, Damaged Hair Manuka Honey and Mafura Oil Sulfate-Free 13 oz
Title: One Star
Review: Not what i expected

Product: SheaMoisture Intensive Hydration Shampoo for Dry, Damaged Hair Manuka Honey and Mafura Oil Sulfate-Free 13 oz
Title: WORKED AMAZING FOR MY LOW PORISITY HAIR!
Review: I did not buy this on amazon i found it on clearance at walmart and i am so glad i decided to buy it! I chopped all of my hair off 5 months ago after being natural without a big chop for 3 years. My hair has been dry and hard to moisturize ( though its growing well) since. I have low porosity hair. This is literally the first time my hair has felt soft and moisturized  in a very long time! Ive tried many shampooes and this is the first i love!

Product: SheaMoisture Intensive Hydration Shampoo for Dry, Damaged Hair Manuka Honey and Mafura Oil Sulfate-Free 13 oz
Title: Works great for me!
Review: This is a great shampoo for dry, damaged hair.  It makes my hair soft and shiny and it smells like wildflower honey.  It definitely hydrates well and it leaves my hair manageable and soft. My hair is color treated and this shampoo is sulfate free and therefore color safe.  My hair is also very dry from heat styling and this shampoo moisturizes my parched strands nicely.  It's really thick and rich and it lathers well, unlike so many sulfate free formulas.  This is perhaps the most hydrating of all the Shea Moisture shampoos I've tried so it's probably not suitable for fine hair.  I also use the Manuka Honey conditioner, which is also very moisturizing and it has a lot of "slip" so detangling is easy.  The combination of these two products give me shiny, soft, hydrated tresses that respond well to my styling efforts.  The shampoo cleanses really well and the conditioner is very nourishing.  I really love them both and they have become holy grail products for me.  I definitely recommend this shampoo (as well as the conditioner) for anyone with dry, color treated hair.  However, you can pick this shampoo and conditioner up at Target or Ulta for $10-$11 apiece, so don't pay outrageous Amazon prices!

Product: SheaMoisture Intensive Hydration Shampoo for Dry, Damaged Hair Manuka Honey and Mafura Oil Sulfate-Free 13 oz
Title: More Clarifying Than It Is Hydrating...
Review: This line of Shea Moisture Hair products smells wonderful! And I want to add that I am in love with Shea Moisture as a brand. I have ALL of the products in the "Strengthen Grow & Restore" line of SM products but I wanted to venture out to try and find items that focused more on hydration. Thought I'd found it in these, especially with a name like INTESIVE HYDRATION, lol. This shampoo does a GREAT job of cleansing. After washing one time, you'll be able to feel that there's no more dirt in your hair which is not the case with the SG&R line (more about that in a separate review). So that is where the 3 stars come in because this Shampoo does a great job of CLARIFYING my hair. But why it doesn't receive 5 stars is because the hydration is just not "Intense" enough...I end up having to use lots of moisturizing products after I've shampooed and conditioned just to combat the severe dryness that is my hair. So in my opinion, it's a great product that tries very hard, but it does not deserve the "intensive hydration" title just yet.

Product: SheaMoisture Intensive Hydration Shampoo for Dry, Damaged Hair Manuka Honey and Mafura Oil Sulfate-Free 13 oz
Title: This shampoo does clean the hair really good for it to be moisturizing
Review: With Shea Moisture, knowing one's porosity and current state helps tremendously with selecting the right products. This shampoo does clean the hair really good for it to be moisturizing. I want to be careful with using the term "clarifying" because some people may have keratin-treated hair as such as myself and at all costs want to avoid that, ha-ha! However, this product's intentions were meant to hydrate dry and/or damaged hair. It is sulfate free and salt-free so if you do have keratin treated hair, I suggest this shampoo. The ingredients in it also help to heal and fight off scalp issues so this is ideal for me.Overall, this shampoo did leave my hair feeling conditioned. It was extremely prepped for the conditioner. My hair texture is wavy/curly and can easily dry out but it is on the finer side. I can not use the deep conditioner since it's too thick for my hair texture, but the conditioner could be applied to hair and used as a deep conditioner because it's lighter, yet equally hydrating.I want to monitor my hair's use with this product. It does contain hydrolyzed rice protein so if you are on the lower-porosity side, you may want to consider that. My hair is lower-porosity, but I don't mind the extra protein if it tries to clarify the keratin out of my hair, joking! I expect the results to vary for this but if you need hydration and a good cleanse, this would be a top choice since it's sulfate-free.

Product: SheaMoisture Intensive Hydration Shampoo for Dry, Damaged Hair Manuka Honey and Mafura Oil Sulfate-Free 13 oz
Title: Burns my scalp
Review: This product literally burned my scalp to the point of bloody scabs forming. The bottle I have has Fragrance (parfum) as the fourth ingredient, so I'm guessing that's what is irritating my scalp. I have the consitioner and mask from this line and they don't irritate my scalp at all. Very disappointed SM feels the need to add so much fragrance to a shampoo when it's just going to be washed down the drain anyway. I don't recommend trying this product, I have never had a reaction to something like this before.

Product: SheaMoisture Intensive Hydration Shampoo for Dry, Damaged Hair Manuka Honey and Mafura Oil Sulfate-Free 13 oz
Title: Worst shampoo EVER! SO bad.
Review: I actually like the scent. But the product quality itself.... SO bad. Go into your pantry, pull out a bottle of honey, wet your hair, dump on a bottle of honey, dump on a bottle of lotion. Just try just rinse it out. My hair has never felt so nasty!!! I had to deal for a week until my regular shampoo came in. Guess I'll use this shampoo as hand soap. Really pricey hand soap. There is absolutely nothing else you can use it for. Dont put it near your hair, you'll never be able to rinse out the nastiness. How does this product have any good reviews?! My hand actually got stuck in my hair when it dried after I used this stuff. Could not get a brush thru my hair either. It made me feel so gross.

Product: SheaMoisture Intensive Hydration Shampoo for Dry, Damaged Hair Manuka Honey and Mafura Oil Sulfate-Free 13 oz
Title: Too sudsy for me
Review: I have very thick 3B curls and I have not used regular shampoo for over 10 years, I normally just use a cheap conditioner or a low "poo" product as a cleansing agent.  I thought I'd give this a try as I really love the intensive conditioner in this same line.  It does say "no sulfates" but it is really way too sudsy and shampoo-y for my taste.  I will continue to use the intensive conditioner and use up the rest of this shampoo but go back to using conditioner or the Devacurl Low-poo cleaner which I've always liked.

Product: SheaMoisture Intensive Hydration Shampoo for Dry, Damaged Hair Manuka Honey and Mafura Oil Sulfate-Free 13 oz
Title: A god send!
Review: So far I am loving this. I just started with this product because my brother uses it so I had to purchase my own. Paired perfectly with the corresponding conditioner which I also purchased is a god send to my hair. Other shampoos and conditioners would dry my hair and leave it super tangled, but with this I just washed conditioned, removed excess water and went about my day. Also seems to be helping with frizz which is a big plus.

Product: SheaMoisture Intensive Hydration Shampoo for Dry, Damaged Hair Manuka Honey and Mafura Oil Sulfate-Free 13 oz
Title: Great For Low Prosity Hair!
Review: This shampoo, conditioner,  and mask is excellent for low prosity 3c, 4abc hair. Such Amazing lather with the shampoo! Silkness/slickness with conditioner and Mask has Ah-mazing Slip makes your waves and curls soft and pop!! This is a "definite" on natural hair gal list!!

Product: SheaMoisture Intensive Hydration Shampoo for Dry, Damaged Hair Manuka Honey and Mafura Oil Sulfate-Free 13 oz
Title: I have tried many shampoos since going natural 3 years ago and my hair hated most but managed to hang in there
Review: Finally!  It has happened to me!  A product that my hair loves.  I have tried many shampoos since going natural 3 years ago and my hair hated most but managed to hang in there.  My hair was so dry.  I had to apply products every day to keep it moisturizer.  Now I use Shea Hydrating and I don't have to use products every day.  I wash my hair with the shampoo, add lotion, greas, (yeah the Dax is still my go to y'all) and Black Castor Oil Lotion(this stuff is ahmazing!) and my hair loves it.  I can go out in the rain, humidity, etc. without my hair shrinking into a hard dry mess.  I must add that trimming your hair is a must.  I needed a serious trim and after that, my hair rocks.  Finally!  I love my natural hair and it feels so soft and luscious!  I just wished they made a bigger bottle but a little product goes a long way.  I would like a bigger bottle tho, just saying.

Product: SheaMoisture Intensive Hydration Shampoo for Dry, Damaged Hair Manuka Honey and Mafura Oil Sulfate-Free 13 oz
Title: has Manuka Honey ingredient which is a healing agent. Good stuff
Review: I love it. very nice and healing to my scalp and moisturizes my long natural curls. However the last shipment I received the safety seal was off and inside the cap and the bottle leaked a little in shipment. I was disappointed and my next purchase will be in the store so I can make sure the safety seal is on.

Product: SheaMoisture Intensive Hydration Shampoo for Dry, Damaged Hair Manuka Honey and Mafura Oil Sulfate-Free 13 oz
Title: Scent Is Too Strong, Irritates Scalp
Review: It does its job as a shampoo. I love the smell. HOWEVER, the smell is too strong. Any heavy perfumes added to hair products irritates my scalp, just like this one did. It made my scalp dry,  scabby and scaly. I cant do this anymore. In the trash it goes.

Product: SheaMoisture Intensive Hydration Shampoo for Dry, Damaged Hair Manuka Honey and Mafura Oil Sulfate-Free 13 oz
Title: Softens grey hair...
Review: Smells delicious and is moisturizing to natural hair. My hair is also going grey sanitizer is drier and wirey. This shampoo softens it.

Product: SheaMoisture Intensive Hydration Shampoo for Dry, Damaged Hair Manuka Honey and Mafura Oil Sulfate-Free 13 oz
Title: Disappointed
Review: Thought i finally found a shampoo and conditioner for my low porosity hair, after the first use my hair came out soft BUT fuzzy and lost curl definition. Im disappointed. Will this situation improve with continued use?

Product: SheaMoisture Intensive Hydration Shampoo for Dry, Damaged Hair Manuka Honey and Mafura Oil Sulfate-Free 13 oz
Title: Great shampoo
Review: Love this shampoo, I've been using it for years, but I think this recent one had a manufacturing defect. It poured out like water when usually it is really thick. It seemed like it was 30% shampoo and 70% water, so much so it poured off my hand so it was hard to try to use it, I had to use half the bottle for one shampoo. I am still giving it a 4 because I really believe there was just something wrong with this one.

Product: SheaMoisture Intensive Hydration Shampoo for Dry, Damaged Hair Manuka Honey and Mafura Oil Sulfate-Free 13 oz
Title: Silk Making Magic
Review: My hair had a dryness with a thirst no moisturizer could quench until I started using this shampoo.  Since I have never been happy with sulfate-free shampoos, I had low expectations for this one. This shampoo lathers and cleanses well. My hair is soft from the time I rinse the shampoo out until the next time I wash my hair. The shampoo has a very pleasant smell and a little goes a long way. I can't imagine going back to any other shampoo.

Product: SheaMoisture Intensive Hydration Shampoo for Dry, Damaged Hair Manuka Honey and Mafura Oil Sulfate-Free 13 oz
Title: Moisturizing shampoo- not very good at cleaning
Review: The scent is wonderful. The shampoo is very gentle and does not clean as well as I thought it would. A quarter-sized amount or more of the shampoo is required even for short hair.

Title: Doesn't work on curly hair

Title: Glad to have found it.

Ulta always has coupon available so that helps in not being concerned with money lost when trying a new product. I think I am now reformed from my hair product hoarding way as I now have a staple shampoo and conditioner set.

Product: SheaMoisture Intensive Hydration Shampoo for Dry, Damaged Hair Manuka Honey and Mafura Oil Sulfate-Free 13 oz
Title: Seems to work great for 4c hair in a protective style
Review: I wash my hair once a week/ 10 days and because this has protein I use this and the conditioner as my protein wash every other week (I use the SM Black Soap purification masque and balancing conditioner as my protein free moisture wash in between)My hair is currently in twists but they seem to clean the scalp well and left my scalp just as soft and moisturized as the Black soap range- which I love!The real test will be washing my hair once out of a protective style.The Manuka Honey range has a much better smell than the the other SM ranges too.

Product: SheaMoisture Intensive Hydration Shampoo for Dry, Damaged Hair Manuka Honey and Mafura Oil Sulfate-Free 13 oz
Title: I'm glad I got to try this shampoo because it is ...

This one has a nice rich moisturizing lather and cleans well even with oils in my hair. It leaves hair really soft and almost don't need a conditioner after. Nothing like the greasy/dried out feeling of the Raw shea line.

Product: SheaMoisture Intensive Hydration Shampoo for Dry, Damaged Hair Manuka Honey and Mafura Oil Sulfate-Free 13 oz
Title: Left residue on roots
Review: I love the smell of this shampoo! I read a few places this is one of the best shampoos for your hair because of the ingredients so I gave it a try. Unfortunately, it left a thick residue on my roots, and it made my hair a bit ratty feeling. The day after, I had to wash with dandruff shampoo to get all the residue out. I'm going to give it another try because I really want to love this shampoo. It might actually be too moisturizing! :\

Product: SheaMoisture Intensive Hydration Shampoo for Dry, Damaged Hair Manuka Honey and Mafura Oil Sulfate-Free 13 oz

That didn't happen.....so my hair kinda broke off and was extremely dry...but since I hadn't had a relaxer in a yr that kind of helped! But after using this tha first time my hair was so soft and I could actually comb through it! I left tha conditioner in over night with flat twists and rinsed it out tha next day!

Product: SheaMoisture Intensive Hydration Shampoo for Dry, Damaged Hair Manuka Honey and Mafura Oil Sulfate-Free 13 oz

Title: Does exactly what it is supposed to!!
Review: The whole Manukau honey set (the shampoo, conditioner, and deep conditioner) did WONDERS for my hair! I saw this method on TikTok where you condition your hair first, shampoo, and then deep condition (Iâ€™ll abbreviate it as the C/S/DC method ðŸ˜œ) and BABY let me tell youâ€¦ my hair has never felt softer and more moisturized! I was a little skeptical at first but now I HIGHLY recommend it if you have dry, low porosity, brittle hair that breaks easily! I used to have TERRIBLE breakage! I mean like losing 3-5 HANDFULS of hair no matter WHAT I did! Iâ€™ve tried several different shampoos, conditioners, and deep conditionersâ€¦ many different oils, Iâ€™ve tried finger detanglingâ€¦ I get regular trims from a licensed hairstylist but NOTHING would help with the breakage but babyâ€¦ doing the C/S/DC method with these products has reduced my breakage GREATLY! In the pic is the amount of hair Iâ€™ve lost from START to FINISH!!! Just a palm full!!! My hair has never felt softer and so moisturized and hydrated!!!! I cannot believe that method with these products reduced my hair breakage that much!!!!!!! Iâ€™m sure you can do the C/S/DC method with any products from any company but if youâ€™re someone like me that has super dry, brittle hair with low porosity and breaks off easily Iâ€™d recommend these from Shea Moisture!! And the manukau honey set smells AMAZING too and the scent lasts which is a plus!!! Iâ€™m super excited now I feel like my hair is really going to start growing and getting stronger now Iâ€™ll be sure to update if anything changes !!! â¤ï¸â¤ï¸â¤ï¸â¤ï¸â¤ï¸

Product: SheaMoisture Intensive Hydration Shampoo for Dry, Damaged Hair Manuka Honey and Mafura Oil Sulfate-Free 13 oz
Title: Verified Purchase
Review: I have to say I'm pretty impressed. I've not had any luck trying Shea Moisture products in the last two years. I've tried various, especially from the famed Coconut and Hibiscus line and hated every single one of them due to their sickly stench and the amount I had to use to look just barely presentable. My hair was made frizzy so I gave them away to my mum who also hated them and threw them away. I was very put off trying Shea Moisture again but seeing so many new product lines and their introduction to stores near me, which otherwise neglect curly hair products, made me want to try once more.This was a pleasant surprise. It smells perfumed and slightly earthy. When wet it smells like macadamia nuts, which I like, so it made me rather pleased. The first time I used it, I had to prepare myself to throw it away because it instantly made my strands stick together as it lathered up so fiercely. But after washing it out fully, my hair felt fine. Not super moisturised like the product claims, honestly, but the way I've always expected from a gentle shampoo. My hair doesn't feel stripped, but just before that stage at super clean. My scalp isn't irritated, I'm guessing that's due to the lack of hard sulfates as I can no longer use regular shampoos that make my scalp burn and itch.I'm still questioning whether I should get it again because As I Am's Coconut Cowash is super moisturising and cleansing at the same time. And I really have a lot of hair and want to keep my wash routine to as minimal steps as possible and the cowash lets me get away with not needing to shampoo and then condition. We'll see, but so far the cowash is winning out as it is also the cheaper of the two for a bigger volume of product. So, if the shampoo were cheaper, I might just designate it my new default cleanser. That being said, I love the packaging and my success with this product has encouraged me to not completely give up hope buying Shea Moisture products in the future.Now if only a wider variety was available' on Amazon...Edit: After much deliberation, I've decided to go back to my cowash. It's cheaper and all of the scabs and itchiness that I used to deal with daily from my sulfate conditioners have returned with this shampoo. It is NOT SULFATE FREE. I do feel lied to, I look on the ingredients, while it has only softer sulfates in it, they're still sulfates. I decided to continue using it because I wanted to give the product a chance but now my scalp is suffering and my hair has become extremely dry over time (this being the only new product to be incorporated into my regular routine) to the point where I have had to cut my hair. I found that many companies are now labelling their products as sulfate free and are not, so be careful.

Review: Iâ€™ve been using this shampoo for more than two years now and always loved it, BUT I recently bought another bottle and something has certainly changed! It lathers up just like other sulphate shampoos, convincing me this is NOT sulphate free. I knew something was wrong when I poured it out of my latest bottle - the consistency and colour were different. Then it lathered up on use. Sulphate free shampoos do not lather! The ingredient list has changed. Theyâ€™ve now started using fake fragrance (aka Parfum) instead of natural fragrance sources. The ingredients they list as not being included has drastically reduced (i.e., the bad stuff in the shampoo is increasing). Itâ€™s a shame that a brand like theirs is trying to cut corners to make a quick buck at the cost of giving customers a truly good, natural product. Donâ€™t expect the same shampoo if youâ€™ve been a regular user like me!

Product: SheaMoisture Intensive Hydration Shampoo for Dry, Damaged Hair Manuka Honey and Mafura Oil Sulfate-Free 24oz
Title: Synthetic fragrance.
Review: While this is supposed to be free from pretty much everything, it's not free from synthetic fragrance (parfum). This brand I have bought many times before and it was scented with essential oils. It does not disclose this on the website. Disappointed I wasted my time in ordering this. Synthetic fragrances trigger my wife's asthma.

Product: SheaMoisture Intensive Hydration Shampoo for Dry, Damaged Hair Manuka Honey and Mafura Oil Sulfate-Free 24oz
Title: My original review was awesome
Review: Why exactly do companies CONSTANTLY have to change products that there is nothing wrong with.  I loved the first bottle it was thick creamy made my course dry thin hair feel amazing.  This last bottle(s) yep like an idiot I ordered 2 of them!!  So upset  I now have dry fuzzy hair again and thick and creamy went right out the window don't put too much of this in your hand or it will run right out and onto the shower floor.  The 1st bottle was amazing no product needed to finish hair after shower just pretty hair.  I never had scalp itch with the 1st bottle now my scalp itches constantly , way to go you saved some money,but you lost at least 1 customer in me.  It doesn't smell,feel or preform the same even my shoulders and back itch after the suds run over them after rinsing.  Do you know how long it took me to find a shampoo that worked this great.  You just don't know how upset I am.  My hair even feels thinner and I swear it is this shampoo.  I am going in search of another brand I can't even tell how much this stinks!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!

Product: SheaMoisture Intensive Hydration Shampoo for Dry, Damaged Hair Manuka Honey and Mafura Oil Sulfate-Free 24oz
Title: Natural, budget-friendly and hydrating
Review: I have 3B curly hair and used this for about 6 months. In that time, I noticed by hair was well-hydrated and kept good curl definition. I didn't feel like it dried out my hair when I used it every other day. I will say that after 6 mos, my hair grew used to it and no longer felt silky soft after every use, but I still use this to take a break from my other more expensive shampoo.Other things I like about this:- natural, non-harmful ingredients- excellent priceI recommend this for anyone who prefers more natural products and needs to retain as much moisture in their hair as possible

Product: SheaMoisture Intensive Hydration Shampoo for Dry, Damaged Hair Manuka Honey and Mafura Oil Sulfate-Free 24oz
Title: Two different formulations
Review: I've found that there are two different formulations of this shampoo. One has fragrance (essential oil blend) and the other has fragrance (parfum) which is also higher up on the list (i.e. more of it). I keep having to return the one with parfum--one from Target and this one from Amazon.

Product: SheaMoisture Intensive Hydration Shampoo for Dry, Damaged Hair Manuka Honey and Mafura Oil Sulfate-Free 24oz
Title: Lathers well, smells great, free of most endocrine disrupting chemicals - but one huge concern...
Review: This product lathers well, smells great, and is free of most of the big offenders when it comes to endocrine disrupting chemicals.However, the product I got has "fragrance (parfum)" in it.  See the images attached to this review for proof. I had contacted the company in advance because I was concerned about this (per other reviews I saw), and they stated "The SheaMoisture Manuka Honey & Mafura Oil Intensive Hydration Shampoo is scented with an Essential oil blend. The product is the same if you purchase it from our website or amazon." Per their recommendation, I bought this product.But, their statement is just not true. I have to rate this product three stars because the company misled me and their product can contains fragrance (parfum), which is considered an "undisclosed mixture of various scent chemicals and ingredients that were used as fragrance dispersants ... such as diethyl phthalate".

Product: SheaMoisture Intensive Hydration Shampoo for Dry, Damaged Hair Manuka Honey and Mafura Oil Sulfate-Free 24oz
Title: Smells great and moisturizing
Review: I bought this shampoo for my dry hair, and I love it! My entire family started using my bottle because it smells so great, so I had to purchase an additional bottle. It has made everyoneâ€™s hair feel and smell wonderful! Love that it is free of the bad stuff found in most shampoos. Worth the price for us.

Product: SheaMoisture Intensive Hydration Shampoo for Dry, Damaged Hair Manuka Honey and Mafura Oil Sulfate-Free 24oz
Title: Moisturizing and long lasting
Review: I would recommend this shampoo for natural hair that is really dry. It leaves my hair really soft and easy to comb. It will last really long because it is thick and doesn't need a lot to work. After one use i was amazed at how little had gone from the bottle. My 2 bottles should last me the whole year

Product: SheaMoisture Intensive Hydration Shampoo for Dry, Damaged Hair Manuka Honey and Mafura Oil Sulfate-Free 24oz
Title: Soft shiny hair, no chemicals to irritate the scalp
Review: I love that it is all natural. So many shampoos today have so many chemicals and they make my head itch or even get a rash. This product doesn't lather well, but as a hairstylist I know, its is still getting my scalp clean and moisturized! Lather doesn't mean clean it's the end result.... and my hair is soft and shiny with no conditioner!love this product

Product: SheaMoisture Intensive Hydration Shampoo for Dry, Damaged Hair Manuka Honey and Mafura Oil Sulfate-Free 24oz
Title: Suds enough for me!
Review: This is my second purchase of this product. Although this doesn't suds up like market-bought shampoos, it sudsed quite sufficiently for me and leaves my hair feeling smooth - even before I use a conditioner. I think it actually helps my hair appear less frizzy as well -- a quality I really appreciate.

Product: SheaMoisture Intensive Hydration Shampoo for Dry, Damaged Hair Manuka Honey and Mafura Oil Sulfate-Free 24oz
Title: Real quality
Review: I would highly recommend this product.  I have color treated hair and have had some issues with dryness and tangling.  After using this shampoo, conditioner and the intensive conditioner my hair is so full and less tangled, I can feel the added moisture too.

Product: SheaMoisture Intensive Hydration Shampoo for Dry, Damaged Hair Manuka Honey and Mafura Oil Sulfate-Free 24oz
Title: Perfect!! Please never change!!!
Review: Good for your hair and you! My daughter got an app which allowed her to check the safety of common products that we use everyday. We were shocked at some of the ingredients in many of the mainstream shampoos and conditioners not to mention a long list of other products. We were in search of moisturizing shampoo and conditioner and decided to try this natural good for you brand. Let me just say WOW!!!! We are all in love with this brand!! It smells amazing, and it restores your hair to a shiny, soft, smooth and healthy texture! Iâ€™ve stated recommending it to everyone and buying it for gifts because thatâ€™s honestly how much I love it! I just did a huge skin care haul of this brand and made my mom a huge basket full of their products! She going through chemo for the second time and these products being healthy and natural while extremely moisturizing and pampering are absolutely perfect!! I feel great knowing that theyâ€™re all exactly what she needs while she can enjoy the luscious formulas and beautiful scents!!Thank you so much for the thoughtful care you put into these products!!

Product: SheaMoisture Intensive Hydration Shampoo for Dry, Damaged Hair Manuka Honey and Mafura Oil Sulfate-Free 24oz
Title: Great!
Review: First, I started with the deep conditioner in this line. I was so amazed by how heavy and effective it was that I decided to try to layer every item in my hair, as I run out of my other products.This shampoo is lighter than I was expecting but that's fine. I wash twice (scalp then hair) and it's just as effective as my other shampoo.I'm not sure that its moisturizing effects linger because I layer on a lot of products. But I like using multiple players in the same line. It makes sense that they'd team up to have a greater impact.The scent is heavy - a hint of honey followed by an near-cologne scent. But I got used to it and don't smell it anymore.

Product: SheaMoisture Intensive Hydration Shampoo for Dry, Damaged Hair Manuka Honey and Mafura Oil Sulfate-Free 24oz
Title: Possibly the Best Shampoo I've Ever Used
Review: I have been using Tresemme products for years.  I decided to try something different as my hair seemed to have lost its body.  I purchased SheaMoisture for two reasons:1.  The price was affordable2.  Description of ingredients and benefits of the productI am in love with SheaMoisture and I don't think I will be going back to Tresemme any time soon, if at all.I only use a tiny bit, less than a dime size, for a full head of lather.  The smell of the shampoo is divine, and lasts all day.  It rinses clean, I don't have to use any conditioner.  And my hair has so much body and fullness, and shines.Will be ordering this repeatedly.

Product: SheaMoisture Intensive Hydration Shampoo for Dry, Damaged Hair Manuka Honey and Mafura Oil Sulfate-Free 24oz
Title: Find another shampoo that works.
Review: This is the worst shampoo I have used. The odor  is very unpleasant but I would deal with it if the product was good. I have to use three to four times the amount of my regular shampoo to wash my hair and my hair feels dry and stiff afterwards. Find another shampoo.

Product: SheaMoisture Intensive Hydration Shampoo for Dry, Damaged Hair Manuka Honey and Mafura Oil Sulfate-Free 24oz
Title: Love it!
Review: After trying the "no poo" movement for a month (was using Loreal's Cleansing Balm), my hair was dry, frizzy, and frustrating. Wound up in a clip or ponytail every day because I couldn't stand to feel it frizzing all over my face and neck. I finally did some research and found that the "no poo" thing just doesn't work for everyone. Hair types, age, hormones, diet, and other factors all play into whether someone can go entirely without shampoo or not. And I can't!I had seen these products before, and heard them recommended by people, so I decided to give it a try. Today was my first use of this shampoo and the conditioner as well. First of all, it smells delicious! The shampoo lathers beautifully. My hair feels soft and healthy, my scalp isn't itching anymore.Win.

Product: SheaMoisture Intensive Hydration Shampoo for Dry, Damaged Hair Manuka Honey and Mafura Oil Sulfate-Free 24oz
Title: Not as good as other Shea Moisture products
Review: Since I have dry hair, I was excited to see what this product could do for me. And it does give really nice curly, smooth pieces of hair.Unfortunately, it also leaves a really serious residue in my hair. This is shampoo; it's supposed to wash out. Instead it sticks to the underlayers of my hair and leaves my scalp looking greasy and unwashed. It's also not really "moisturized," more just... dry with residue. It's brittle and more difficult to brush.I tried more intense rinsing, less shampoo, different application... nothing really made this one work for me. Maybe if you've got 4A-4C hair like they recommend, but I've noticed 4A-4C people on this product mentioning the same problems.

Product: SheaMoisture Intensive Hydration Shampoo for Dry, Damaged Hair Manuka Honey and Mafura Oil Sulfate-Free 24oz
Title: The worse product ever!!!!!
Review: Made my hair really brittle,dry and knotted up!!!!! I had to pay money for a hair dresser and have my hair cut...... And I had a wedding to be in and had to spend extra money due to this horrid product!!!!!!

Product: SheaMoisture Intensive Hydration Shampoo for Dry, Damaged Hair Manuka Honey and Mafura Oil Sulfate-Free 24oz
Title: Great for dry hair
Review: I am 70, live in Phoenix, & have an autoimmune condition that causes dry hair, skin, & nails. In other words, I have 3 strikes against me in the dry hair dept. Also, my hair is waist length. I decided to switch shampoo because my hair was getting stinky (like BO) after a couple of days this summer. Because of my autoimmunity, I have to be careful about what personal care products I use. My tolerance for chemicals & scents is affected. The SheaMoisture shampoo & conditioner have been a perfect solution for me. The scents have not bothered me, & my hair is much softer. I still have to use Shea butter on the very ends of my hair, but this combo has made a big improvement in my hair.

Product: SheaMoisture Intensive Hydration Shampoo for Dry, Damaged Hair Manuka Honey and Mafura Oil Sulfate-Free 24oz
Title: Love this product line; this shampoo smells great!
Review: Smells great AND also has great moisturizing properties. It's quite rich so you actually only need a small amount, pour carefully. It leaves my hair feeling soft and clean. I have naturally curly hair which tends to get dry very easily and requires LOTS of products to keep it tamed. I use mostly Shea Moisture products, everything from this shampoo to the mousse, leave-in conditioners, and moisturizing spritzes. I definitely recommend trying this product.

Product: SheaMoisture Intensive Hydration Shampoo for Dry, Damaged Hair Manuka Honey and Mafura Oil Sulfate-Free 24oz
Title: Not the best Moisturizer
Review: I am going back to Creme of Naure with Honey. If this product moisturizes, then Creme of Nature with honey super moisturizes. I didn't feel this product had intensive hydration. I have a water filter on my showerhead, so I know it isn't the minerals in my water that doesn't make this work. I am back to Creme of Nature. I have the shampoo and conditioner. I will use it on wigs and hairpieces, it works well on them, just not my dry, frizzy, coarse hair.

Product: SheaMoisture Intensive Hydration Shampoo for Dry, Damaged Hair Manuka Honey and Mafura Oil Sulfate-Free 24oz
Title: pretty decent
Review: iâ€™ve tried shea moisture before and it just never seemed to work for my 4c hair despite the positive reviews from people with my similar texture. but for some reason this shampoo just hit all the right spots.i used this as a moisturizing shampoo for my locs after i cleansed with trader joeâ€™s tea tree tingle shampoo and it was wonderful. of course itâ€™s not going to give you hydration a shampoo would, but it left my hair feeling a lot less stripped after cleansing.my hair is a big fan of honey so i was happy that my high hopes were met. hopefully this shampoo becomes a regular part of my wash day routine.the scent was a little strong at first, but you get used to if after a while if you arenâ€™t sensitive to smells.

Product: SheaMoisture Intensive Hydration Shampoo for Dry, Damaged Hair Manuka Honey and Mafura Oil Sulfate-Free 24oz
Title: Absolutely Fantastic Product!!
Review: Overall, this shampoo has made my hair feeling really moisturized and clean. Something that I stand strongly about this product is that all the ingredients are natural. It makes me feel more secure on what I am using instead of all the chemicals that most brands add to their shampoo's and conditioners.Pros:-Smells very nice, not too strong of a scent.-Keeps my hair moisturized after use-Ingredients are natural-Healthy and shiny looking after useCons:-Doesn't foam (which wasn't a huge issue)-Need a decent amount of shampoo for application

Product: SheaMoisture Intensive Hydration Shampoo for Dry, Damaged Hair Manuka Honey and Mafura Oil Sulfate-Free 24oz
Title: hope I can get a refund
Review: this makes me sad, as I love Minooka honey, but the shampoo is making my scalp itch and burn, and now my scalp is red.

Product: SheaMoisture Intensive Hydration Shampoo for Dry, Damaged Hair Manuka Honey and Mafura Oil Sulfate-Free 24oz
Title: Decent for low porosity hair
Review: After completely destroying my hair with protein overload, I needed something that could moisturize my hair without being too heavy on the proteins. This does a way better job over the Curl & Shine line imo, as it is far less likely to weigh down 3b and 3a hair. I just wish this product did a better job at providing that hydration for longer.I'll always keep this around since it does work well, I just need something else to really keep my hair happy because the longer it can maintain moisture after fully drying, the better

Product: SheaMoisture Intensive Hydration Shampoo for Dry, Damaged Hair Manuka Honey and Mafura Oil Sulfate-Free 24oz
Title: A pretty good shampoo
Review: I bought this shampoo to relieve my oily scalp and because it is sulfate free and has more natural ingredients. After use, it definitely made my hairâ€™s oil amount decrease and increased as well as extended the amount of days that my scalp is dry and free of oil. I will say though, this product made my scalp itch a bit but it was nothing too bad. My natural hair is about a 3a to a 3b (wavy/curly but not extremely curly) and this shampoo does a good job cleaning my scalp. I personally like the scent but I will say it is a bit strong, it smells very tart. This scent can easily be covered up with a leave in conditioner or a hair oil that is applied after showering. Overall, I enjoy this product!

Product: SheaMoisture Intensive Hydration Shampoo for Dry, Damaged Hair Manuka Honey and Mafura Oil Sulfate-Free 24oz
Title: The product actually works on my granddaughter's ethnic hair and her rare beauty.
Review: The smell of the shampoo is like coconut . . . it reminds you of the tropics.  Callie is 6 years old and is a product of two wonderful races, but we did not know what to do with her hair!  It was a real challenge for us.  So we investigated and SHEA MOISTURE products gets to the ROOT of her hair with the shampoo.  A critical factor.  Now she just has ringlets.  She is amazing and tall and statuesque and BEAUTIFUL!!Woo-woo!  Thank you Amazon and SHEA MOISTURE PRODUCTS.

Product: SheaMoisture Intensive Hydration Shampoo for Dry, Damaged Hair Manuka Honey and Mafura Oil Sulfate-Free 24oz
Title: An Absolute Disaster for 4C Natural Hair!
Review: I am so upset that I wasted my money on this shampoo that promises intense hydration and delivered the exact opposite. It completely destroyed my hair follices, creating a very rough texture and thousands of knots. Additionally it smells like a cheap, male cologne. Yuk. I also bought the conditioner in the same line which also further destroyed my hair texture. Wash day disaster! This product must be fake. Do not waste your money.

Product: SheaMoisture Intensive Hydration Shampoo for Dry, Damaged Hair Manuka Honey and Mafura Oil Sulfate-Free 24oz
Title: Helped scalp itch and hair loss
Review: I have used a few times now and it has cut down on my itchy scalp...maybe hair loss (have long hair and am older)  I do not have dandruff but scalp has itched for last 10 years.  Hope this continues to help.

Product: SheaMoisture Intensive Hydration Shampoo for Dry, Damaged Hair Manuka Honey and Mafura Oil Sulfate-Free 24oz
Title: A must buy
Review: So at first I wasn't too sure about this shampoo &Conditioner, when I was putting it on in the shower it seemed like they were doing much.I have been using this for over a month now and I AM ABSOUTELY IN LOVE with my hair now!! It has never been healthier, softer and as tangle free as it is now using these products! 10/10 reccomend!

Product: SheaMoisture Intensive Hydration Shampoo for Dry, Damaged Hair Manuka Honey and Mafura Oil Sulfate-Free 24oz
Title: Great for coarse, dry, or damaged hair
Review: MENS HAIR REVIEW: This product is does a good job cleaning hair without removing too much of the natural oils. I wash with this about 1-2 times a week and condition on the days in between with the coconut/shea butter product from the same brand. I have a very dirty job and it gets everything out with about a tablespoon of product. Gave the scent a 4 only because it doesnâ€™t have much of a scent at all.  Not a big deal since the conditioner I use after has a great scent!!! If youâ€™re looking to go with natural ingredient products this is an affordable option with great results.

Product: SheaMoisture Intensive Hydration Shampoo for Dry, Damaged Hair Manuka Honey and Mafura Oil Sulfate-Free 24oz
Title: Smells great and has natural ingredients.
Review: My wife uses this and just loves it. It is very moisture intensive, so if you have dry hair this may work. I used it on my hair and perhaps I used too much. It made my hair a bit too greasy. It would be great for someone with a dry or itchy scalp, or someone whose hair may be brittle. The ingredients are great, not filled with chemicals and mostly plant based. It smells good too. My wife has used several bottles and continues to enjoy it.

Product: SheaMoisture Intensive Hydration Shampoo for Dry, Damaged Hair Manuka Honey and Mafura Oil Sulfate-Free 24oz
Title: the softness!!!!!
Review: Oh man I just used this shampoo along with the deep conditioner, it was a game changer!!! First my hair has unbelievable soft during the washing processing so I thought it wouldn't last once I rinsed it out but I was wrong then the deep conditioner it made detangling a breeze. I have medium short 4B and 4C low porosity

Product: SheaMoisture Intensive Hydration Shampoo for Dry, Damaged Hair Manuka Honey and Mafura Oil Sulfate-Free 24oz
Title: Moisturizes well, contains no actual honey.
Review: This shampoo is VERY moisturizing. I used it every wash for about a week and now am alternating because it moisturizes a bit too well. I, like others, am confused about the label though. The ingredients list contains no actual Manuka Honey(or any honey for that matter) so it's a bit misleading. Still unsure if it's worth the price.

Product: SheaMoisture Intensive Hydration Shampoo for Dry, Damaged Hair Manuka Honey and Mafura Oil Sulfate-Free 24oz
Title: Was excited but this product sucjs
Review: A LOT of residue left over on the hair. Never experienced this much left over residue.  Like so much it'll make my hair stiff after using it. Doesnt really fully wash off,  feels slimy on my neck/ ears after using it from the residue, have to use a crap ton just to even attempt to get any oils out. Hair gets greasy immediately. Weighs down your hair, so if you dont have much volume I wouldnt reccomend.  Only good thing about this product is that its sulfate free and doesnt irritate the scalp,  but that doesnt matter when it doesnt actually shampoo your hair. Get a dif product!

Product: SheaMoisture Intensive Hydration Shampoo for Dry, Damaged Hair Manuka Honey and Mafura Oil Sulfate-Free 24oz
Title: Love this Shampoo
Review: I love this shampoo.  I find it's got a very nice scent, and it really moisturizes my dry, curly hair.  Reason I gave it 4 stars is because it was poorly packaged and it leaked over the other items I purchased.

Product: SheaMoisture Intensive Hydration Shampoo for Dry, Damaged Hair Manuka Honey and Mafura Oil Sulfate-Free 24oz
Title: Smells like box dye / heavy chemical scent
Review: Iâ€™ve been using the conditioner and conditioning mask in the same scent and decided to order the shampoo as I adore the honey scent.I took a whif of the product while removing the safety seal and it smelt fine, but when I applied it in the shower it had a pungent chemical scent, literally smelt like box dye. Will not repurchase and I do not recommend.

Product: SheaMoisture Intensive Hydration Shampoo for Dry, Damaged Hair Manuka Honey and Mafura Oil Sulfate-Free 24oz
Title: Crunchy Hair
Review: I tried this and the paired conditioner as a high moisture shampoo/conditioner as a replacement for the Devacurl Decadence line (made my scalp itchy). I have high porosity, 3b/3c curls that need a lot of moisture, so I thought for sure that this "intensive hydration" combo would be a good fit. Not the case, unfortunately. After the first use, my hair is crunchy, dry, and rough. Really bummed, but will be looking for other products.

Product: SheaMoisture Intensive Hydration Shampoo for Dry, Damaged Hair Manuka Honey and Mafura Oil Sulfate-Free 24oz
Title: Great for curly, wavy hair
Review: The scent is heavenly and nothing has made my hair this nice, not even oil treatment, truly magical stuff.  I use the conditioner as well, they're both amazing and very affordable.  I'm a white woman with pretty wavy, curly hair and this stuff does the trick for me without any need for leave ins, I just use a little natural aloe for gel when needed.  Amazing product, please never discontinue!

Product: SheaMoisture Intensive Hydration Shampoo for Dry, Damaged Hair Manuka Honey and Mafura Oil Sulfate-Free 24oz
Title: So sad
Review: I heard great things about sheamoisture so I decided to try it out. Unfortunately they changed the ingredients when they sold the company to dove and unilever. They added perfume to the ingredients which is completely overwhelming. Really dislike it will return and not buy anymore of their products going forward. Wish I could have tried them before the change :(

Product: SheaMoisture Intensive Hydration Shampoo for Dry, Damaged Hair Manuka Honey and Mafura Oil Sulfate-Free 24oz
Title: This is clean and green,
Review: This has helped so much with my hair growing back, I was panicking because my hair is falling so much with this other shampoo I was using. I soon realized that the fragrance was irritating my scalp and causing scabs and hair to fall out. I found through the dirty app this shampoo it is rated clean and green. Decided to try it out and now Iâ€™m in love with this product <3

Product: SheaMoisture Intensive Hydration Shampoo for Dry, Damaged Hair Manuka Honey and Mafura Oil Sulfate-Free 24oz
Title: Misleading, contains no Manuka honey.
Review: Label says Manuka Honey multiple times in the name, packaging, and description of the product, but once I received the bottle the ingredients list no honey whatsoever. I imagine this is why no ingredients are included on the product listing.

Product: SheaMoisture Intensive Hydration Shampoo for Dry, Damaged Hair Manuka Honey and Mafura Oil Sulfate-Free 24oz

Product: SheaMoisture Intensive Hydration Shampoo for Dry, Damaged Hair Manuka Honey and Mafura Oil Sulfate-Free 24oz

Product: SheaMoisture Intensive Hydration Shampoo for Dry, Damaged Hair Manuka Honey and Mafura Oil Sulfate-Free 24oz
Title: Loved this product

Product: SheaMoisture Intensive Hydration Shampoo for Dry, Damaged Hair Manuka Honey and Mafura Oil Sulfate-Free 24oz
Title: I LOVE IT
Review: I LOVE IT!!! I finally found a shampoo that DOESNâ€™T dry my hair out. For a second I thought I was shampoo but yâ€™all.. this is a miracle. Donâ€™t worry Iâ€™m a real person and I have 4b hair. Iâ€™m gonna definitely try it on my lil sisters hair which is 4c

Title: Best Shampoo for Healthier manageable Hair!

Product: SheaMoisture Intensive Hydration Shampoo for Dry, Damaged Hair Manuka Honey and Mafura Oil Sulfate-Free 24oz
