Product: SheaMoisture Intensive for Dry,12 oz
Title: I hate title lines
Review: HOW TO USE :wet hair in the shower and massage generously from scalp to endsdo everything elsethen apply shampoo directly (I usually use a 'conditioner shampoo' but it works well with a regular one too) and rinse with cold waterI learned about shea moisture when I worked at a beauty supply store. I do not personally have ethnic hair, but I liked the ingredients and story behind the company and began using their products.This one in particular was difficult to work with because of how thick the texture was. It felt like slathering straight up nivea on my head til I figured I could water it down in the jar and use it on wet hair. It was a game changer. If you're having issues with this product, try it this way.I have thick asian hair (plus its heavily bleached), ranging from 1b-2a,  so not the target audience for these products, but I believe theyre quite universal.I don't think it's a bad product, it is probably specifically targetting a certain hair texture and seems to work fine for that, but for most 1a-2c, this method gives the best results.Update : so apparently this is in fact only made for type 4 hair as I predicted HOWEVER you can still use it if you're not a type 4 by adding a lot of water. I find that it works well because it maintains the structure of my super porous hair

Product: SheaMoisture Intensive for Dry,12 oz
Title: Love this product! Smells so good!
Review: My first month using this conditioning product and I could not ask for more! I love it! I use it almost every day. Some people wash their hair a few times a week; it does not work for my hair. My hairs actually misbehave when I wait a few days. before I wash. It also took much longer to brush or comb out. It feels softer and behaves much better when I wash it daily; and this product helps me keep my hair soft and luscious. It smells so good to me, the product works on my hair and the price is amazing too for what you are getting! I Will buy it again and I highly recommend it!

Product: SheaMoisture Intensive for Dry,12 oz
Title: Perfect
Review: Iâ€™ll start by saying I am a woman of color but I have very â€œdifferentâ€ hair. I generally have loose coils, thick roots, and somewhat of thin but still kinda thick hair.Wellâ€¦ This is the product Iâ€™ve been missing all of my life. I used a new shampoo and conditioner by another brand and I was not impressed. My hair felt less moisturized, dull, fragile.. just everything I didnâ€™t want it to feel like. I decided to try this masque to bring my hair back to life, and boy it did. Very satisfied with how well it took to my hair.

Product: SheaMoisture Intensive for Dry,12 oz
Title: ONE OF THE BEST FOR DRY, CURLY HAIR!
Review: Really has worked very well on my incredibly dry, long salt 'n pepper curls.  One note: need to rinse VERY VERY WELL, or it can make your hair *seem* oily when it's not. Leaves my hair full of moisture & springy curls that bounce back into place w/out having to add additional moisture or leave-in conditioner like I usually have to.The first time I used it, thought I'd rinsed ok but then it seemed to collect all the dust in the air,  (we live in a place that was near huge fires last year, the dust has become so bad that if you dust something, a few hrs later it already needs to be dusted again.). If I rinse w/ the intent of REALLY rinsing well, its better.

Product: SheaMoisture Intensive for Dry,12 oz
Title: So Far So Good - Don't Cut Yourself
Review: First night I used it was for a quick 5 minute mask replacing my conditioner. The next morning my hair was much less frizzy and looked more smooth and was manageable. Only complaint - is second time I used it and gripped the lid with my fingers extending beyond the underside of the lid is that the twist motion actually cut my finger on the sharp underside or the lid like a nice paper cut. Use a flat hand and apply pressure on top of the lid to open it.

Product: SheaMoisture Intensive for Dry,12 oz
Title: Regret buying this with shampoo and conditioner
Review: Didnâ€™t hydrate as the review said that this and the shampoo and conditioner would. I got a lot of breakage and fall out. My hair became very dry and brittle using Lotta body works better and it actually moisturizing/hydrating.

Product: SheaMoisture Intensive for Dry,12 oz
Title: Love it!
Review: I havenâ€™t found better yet! Love this conditioner! My hair is 4b and I know this is conditioner is the reason I get so many compliments on how healthy my hair is.

Product: SheaMoisture Intensive for Dry,12 oz
Title: Great for a variety of hair types
Review: First of all, the scent is AMAZING. The smell stayed in my hair until the next wash. It made my 3a hair feel amazing without being too heavy (I made sure to rinse well). My boyfriend has 4c hair and he absolutely loves this as well. We've always loved this brand but this one is definitely a new favorite.

Product: SheaMoisture Intensive for Dry,12 oz
Title: Cabellos suave e hidratado
Review: Me encanta... me deja el cabello super suave y manejable. Tenia un problema de resequedad en mi cabellos se me estaban saliendo y partiendo mucho, desde que la empece a usar noto el cambio. La alterno con un acondicionador de milk shake y la diferencia es mucha en cuanto a como queda el pelo. Solo se necesita un poco y hace el trabajo. Me la aplico todas las semanas despues del lavado. 100% recomendada

Product: SheaMoisture Intensive for Dry,12 oz
Title: Great product!
Review: I use this product about once every two weeks. I use the hair masque after using the SheaMoisture Manuka Honey & Marfura Oil shampoo and left it on for only a few minutes, I'd didn't see much improvement. However, when I decided to "occlude" my hair with a shower cap and apply heat, it really shut down the breakage in my hair. My hair felt healthy, thicker, and softer. I didn't have to fight with the pick to untangle my hair. I'm pleased with the results. Great product!

Product: SheaMoisture Intensive for Dry,12 oz
Title: Perfect for naturally curly hair that needs some extra tlc.
Review: This conditions my hair beautifully. It's really thick as a deep conditioner treatment should be. Doesn't make my hair feel overly heavy or too oily afterwards. I have thick, curly and coarse hair so managing it can be a nightmare but this has helped me so much. I love the smell. So natural and clean not overly perfumed.

Product: Shea Moisture Manuka Honey & Mafura Oil Twist-defining Custard Moisturizer for Unisex, 12 Ounce
Title: Does nothing - formula changed
Review: I recently wrote a similar review for another Shea Moisture product that I had used loyally for almost a decade. As I feared, this product formula has also changed. It used to have this rich scent, intense moisture, and great slip that my thick, dry, tight curls loved. This project arrived yesterday and it's essentially hand lotion. It did nothing. I could hardly get it to separate in my hands to smooth on my hair - it just stayed in clumps. And after putting it in my hair, I could hardly get a comb through it. Very disappointed. Shame on Sundial and Unilever for messing with perfection and insulting a very loyal customer base.

Product: Shea Moisture Manuka Honey & Mafura Oil Twist-defining Custard Moisturizer for Unisex, 12 Ounce
Title: 1) The stuff is absolutely amazing when it comes to making your hair soft
Review: I'm giving this a four star review for a couple of reasons:1) The stuff is absolutely amazing when it comes to making your hair soft. Holy crap. I'm a 3c and this stuff made my poof ball feel so good! I didn't need a ton of it, and yeah... love it.Why not five stars?2) The smell. I hate, hate, hate the smell. It is sharp and has a ring of cologne. Granted, I have a pretty sensitive nose, but this stuff... whew. Were it not for the amazing way my hair feels, I'd not use it again. Even as it stands, as part of any nightly ritual, I think I'm going to leave it out and stick to the curl enhancing smoothie. I wash my hair twice a week, once with a clarifying shampoo, the other with something far gentler (also by Shea Moisture). I'm likely going to have it just be after my clarifying wash since it tends to leave my hair a bit dry.Other than that... the stuff is like gold as far as moisture and styling. I was delighted by that aspect. If only it smelled like the smoothie. I would be in heaven!

Product: Shea Moisture Manuka Honey & Mafura Oil Twist-defining Custard Moisturizer for Unisex, 12 Ounce
Title: Smooth for extra dry hair
Review: I love this hair twist moisture product because it's adds moisture to my dry hair especially when it comes to twisting it. Now I have not tried the wet method as of yet but I will the next hair day. The dry method make sure not to put too much or too little and it will take time to figure that solution out but once you get that omg the curls are popping. Now there is a but of a flaking but thats when working with the hair putting it up  or even maybe too much product. But I highly recommend this product for extra dry hair 4c maybe even 4b hair. I don't really have coils I just have zigzag type hair so if this helps I hope it does.

Product: Shea Moisture Manuka Honey & Mafura Oil Twist-defining Custard Moisturizer for Unisex, 12 Ounce
Title: Excellent hold and moisture.
Review: I like this product for my locs because it's lightweight, holds nice, and doesn't leave that white flaky crust like some other products do. I use it all the time, even when I'm retwisting and styling my locs on my own.

Product: SheaMoisture Hydrate and Replenish Shampoo, Conditioner and Hair Masque for Curly Hair Manuka Honey and Marfura Oil Deep Conditioning Hair Treatment to Hydrate and Replenish Hair 3 Count
Title: 5.0 out of 5 stars
Review: This comes as a boxed set with the shampoo, conditioner, and masque (conditioning treatment).Iâ€™ve been a SheaMoisture fan for years now so when I had a curly haired child I knew where to go! I first tried the Raw Shea masque and unfortunately something in it broke him out in a rash but it worked sooo well on my toddlerâ€™s 3b hair. I was so excited to try this line and it didnâ€™t disappoint!!First off the smell is heavenly. I wasnâ€™t sure what to think of it at first, kind of a honey floral smell, hard to explain, but it really grew on me and now itâ€™s delicious and I could smell my toddlerâ€™s head all day. Seriously! Itâ€™s delicious and I want a matching lotion.Anyway, the shampoo is white (not see through or clear) and very conditioning while still cleaning and sudsing on his hair. I actually found it pretty detangling on its own for his thin hair. The conditioner isnâ€™t too thick and has decent slip. I like using a wide tooth comb to detangle with it. The shampoo and conditioner on their own work amazingly on his hair and make it so much more manageable. On days where we donâ€™t wash I use the treatment masque. Itâ€™s thick and very hydrating and his hair just sucks it right up. As a great bonus, this set does not cause him any rashes and is very gentle on his hair and skin! I will definitely purchase and recommend to others ðŸ˜I hope you found this review helpful

Product: SheaMoisture Hydrate and Replenish Shampoo, Conditioner and Hair Masque for Curly Hair Manuka Honey and Marfura Oil Deep Conditioning Hair Treatment to Hydrate and Replenish Hair 3 Count
Title: VINE VOICE
Review: I have very curly hair thatâ€™s just past my shoulders and we have a variety of hair types in the family. Although I try to pull out from the sets the ones that are curly girl approved, not all of SheaMoisuture products are, the only one in the set is the Shampoo.I love using this as a deep conditioner once a week and can get 4-5 applications when generously used. Title: 4.0 out of 5 stars
Review: Being that my hair is naturally curly, fine and thin, I thought this collection might help tame it a bit, so I requested it and here we are. This review is for: SheaMoisture Hydrate and Replenish Shampoo, Conditioner and Hair Masque for Curly Hair Manuka ...My hair is now mostly silver/gray/white. As many of us older folks know, gray hair does not act like regular hair. It's more wiry and hard to tame or at least it is for me. This set has helped me get my hair more under my control. I have less fly-aways, less frizz, and more manageability.I especially love the hair mask. It smells wonderful, (I think the entire set smells great), and the difference in my hair after I use it is almost miraculous. It's softer, easier to style and it looks so much healthier!The price is reasonable for this set and as such, I might make it a permanent addition to my hair care regimen.

Product: SheaMoisture Manuka Honey & Mafura Oil Intensive Hydration Shampoo & Conditioner | Set of 2 | 13 fl. Oz. each
Title: Super happy after one use!!
Review: I'm very happy with it after first use!!! Look how shiny and healthy my curls look!!! I did not put anything it after washing,I just let it air dry so I could see how much of a difference it did or didn't make. My hair has been so dry and breaking off lately, I usually have very dry scalp and dandruff so the shampoo I usually use is harsh on my hair. I was a little worried my scalp would suffer if I switched shampoos, but my scalp was super dry and itchy anyways,and the dandruff shampoo did not seem to be helping anymore so I figured it wouldn't hurt, AND MY SCALP ACTUALLY STOPPED ITCHING!! Idk what that has to do with but maybe the dandruff shampoo was TOO harsh and that's what was causing the dryness in the first place? Idk I'm no hair expert. Bit my scalp feels moisturized, my hair is bouncy and silky and it smells sooo good. And i'm super excited, I'll update if my opinion changes

Product: SheaMoisture Manuka Honey & Mafura Oil Intensive Hydration Shampoo & Conditioner | Set of 2 | 13 fl. Oz. each
Title: Works for me
Review: Even though this product is listed for African-American clientele, I, a Caucasian lady, finds many benefits for my hair. I am an older lady, 64, with very dry hair. As I have aged, my hair has become quite dry. I wanted a product that was free of sulfates, and decided to give the product a try. I have not been disappointed. I wash my hair twice a week using these products.

Product: SheaMoisture Manuka Honey & Mafura Oil Intensive Hydration Shampoo & Conditioner | Set of 2 | 13 fl. Oz. each
Title: Skin reaction
Review: Let me start by saying I've used SheaMoisture products for years. I'm 63 years old. I've never experienced any sensitives to their products. As a matter of fact, I like their products very much. Yes, I read other people's reviews and just assumed the people who experienced problems were susceptible to sensitivities. However that said, I had problems with this pair of products. I used the set twice. The first time I felt the shampoo left my wavy/curly hair coated. The conditioner seemed to weight it down top of my hair already feeling coated by the shampoo. The next morning I awoke to redness around my hairline as well as some splotches on my face. I also experienced patches on my scalp. I attempted to shampoo my hair with my regular SheaMoisture products but still felt my hair "coated" and scalp itchy. So much so I went to the store to purchase a gentle clarifying shampoo. I washed my hair twice the same day until it felt somewhat normal again. I see by the reviews many people have had very successful experiences with this combination. I'm sure it's a wonderful product, it  gave me a scary reaction. I returned the product thanks to Amazon.

Product: SheaMoisture Manuka Honey & Mafura Oil Intensive Hydration Shampoo & Conditioner | Set of 2 | 13 fl. Oz. each
Title: Londa wit da good hair
Review: I have 4c kinky coily hair but When I used this product I felt like Becky with the good hair

Product: SheaMoisture Manuka Honey & Mafura Oil Intensive Hydration Shampoo & Conditioner | Set of 2 | 13 fl. Oz. each
Title: Delivered fast, great product
Review: Absolutely love this product and all other shea moisture products. I have naturl 3C/4A hair and a dry scalp. One wash my hair is completely soft smells great curls feel stronger.

Product: SheaMoisture Manuka Honey & Mafura Oil Intensive Hydration Shampoo & Conditioner | Set of 2 | 13 fl. Oz. each
Title: GLAD I TOOK A LEAP OF FAITH
Review: EXACTLY WHAT I NEEDED, I have high porosity  2C hair, ive tried moui moisture vanilla bean sham&condi for dry hair as well as the shea moisture hibiscus and coconut sham&condi, If youâ€™ve looked into the shea moisture high porosity line and were scared due to the stench most reviewers talked about and are looking for something in that range! THIS IS IT!!!GLAD I TOOK A LEAP OF FAITH!SO MUCH MOISTURE AND NO BUILD UP, DOESNT WEIGH MY HAIR DOWN AT ALL!

Product: SheaMoisture Manuka Honey & Mafura Oil Intensive Hydration Shampoo & Conditioner | Set of 2 | 13 fl. Oz. each
Title: Honestly the best !
Review: I love Shea moisture products and use them regularly. This shampoo and conditioner set is by far my favorite. I have coarse and dry wavy hair and I made the mistake of dying my hair after already bleaching it. My hair was so damaged it felt like straw when I ran my fingers through my hair and it easily became tangled. After first use of this product my hair feels soft and looks shiny and healthy. Itâ€™s amazing ! The shea moisture line have the best products out there and they are all natural without any added chemicals too!

Product: SheaMoisture Manuka Honey & Mafura Oil Intensive Hydration Shampoo & Conditioner | Set of 2 | 13 fl. Oz. each
Title: Smells and leaves hair feeling amazing!
Review: Before purchasing and trying this Manuka Honey and Mafura Oil Intensive Hydration version of SheaMoisture, I had purchased and tried many other versions (including Jamaican Black Castor Oil; Sacha Inchi Oil; Raw Shea Butter; and Coconut & Hibiscus) and none delivered on its claims or reviews. I had pretty much written off SheaMoisture. Then, I tried this Manuka Honey and Mafura Oil Intensive Hydration version. Game changer. SheaMoisture redeemer!  I love this version and have now repurchased the shampoo, conditioner, and hair masque 2-3 times. The products are extremely moisturizing and leave my hair moisturized and free of tangles. Plus, I am very sensitive to fragrances, and I absolutely love this fragrance! I hope that this product remains consistent and that my hair continues to respond well to it.(The only product in this line that I do not care for is the leave-in milk. The one that I received didnâ€™t have the â€œsignatureâ€ fragrance, and it didnâ€™t seem to be particularly moisturizing. However, since this review is for the shampoo and conditioner set, I am not rating the leave-in milk here.)

Product: SheaMoisture Manuka Honey & Mafura Oil Intensive Hydration Shampoo & Conditioner | Set of 2 | 13 fl. Oz. each
Title: The Products Have Changed
Review: I was excited to use this shampoo and conditioner. I don't like to write a negative review, but this is my experience.  I have used Shea Moisture shampoo and conditioner before. I used it because it's cruelty free, fair trade and because of the pure and natural ingredients. And I liked how it cleansed and conditioned my hair. It stated on the previous bottles that the ingredients are sourced globally. I noticed right away that the scent of this shampoo and conditioner smelled very strong and it didn't smell natural. The company said it's scented with essential oils. I decided to try them. I developed a headache and I also noticed a lot of hair coming out and in the drain. I also noticed that the new bottles have a lot of ingredients that aren't so natural as before ,and that it does not state that the ingredients are sourced globally either. The scent is very strong and doesn't smell natural to me. I had to wash my hair several times to get the scent out. Unilever owns Shea Moisture now.  I do not feel that the products are natural like the were before. I returned the shampoo and conditioner and will not be purchasing their products.

Product: SheaMoisture Manuka Honey & Mafura Oil Intensive Hydration Shampoo & Conditioner | Set of 2 | 13 fl. Oz. each
Title: Keratin Treated Asian Hair
Review: I was searching weeks for a good sulfate free shampoo and conditioner to use after my first Keratin treatment. After weeks of reading reviews, i decided to go with this brand. First use: the shampoo is not foamy at all - which is a good indication of the absence of sulfates. The conditioner was light and not greasy, something i really enjoy. My hair is originally fine, very frizzy and overly processed. This combo works well on my hair, it is gentle and light. Hair is not weighed down. The scent is like figs and oils mixture but not over-powering. Will order again!

Product: SheaMoisture Manuka Honey & Mafura Oil Intensive Hydration Shampoo & Conditioner | Set of 2 | 13 fl. Oz. each
Title: If you are debating on buying this...get it..now!!!!!
Review: First off, before I tell you how amazing this stuff is, let me say that I transitioned from a perm. My hair was damaged. And following my pregnancy my hair became more brittle and dry by the day. This time last year I shaved most of my head and restarted the growth process. I thought it would help me with a new start. Nope, my hair was still dry and brittle. The past month, I did endless research on what start using in my hair to get it back healthy. My hair does not fall in to 3 or 4 abcdefg or whatever else these curly people classify for their hair. Its naturally just kinky straight with a slight wave, but can be hard to maintain unless it is wet or have leave in conditioner. I didnt want that anymore.So I came across this shampoo and conditioner...this was my last resort before I went back to a perm...oh my heavens!!!!!!!! This stuff is amazing!!!!!!! I knew from the moment I used the shampoo I would love it. It lathered right away, I rinsed it out and my hair was already smoother and softer. I combed through my hair, and put the conditioner in then combed it through my hair again. Immediately my hair felt even better. Then once I rinsed it out, I almost cried. Lol!!! My hair was soooo soft and hydrated, for the first time in almost 2 years. I did not even feel like I needed to add any lotion or hair oil, it was that soft and moisturized. I do not blow dry my hair. Never have..once my hair dried, it dried in its kinly straight texture still feeling hydrated!!! I have never been so impressed by a shampoo and conditioner. But if you have been in my situation then you definitely understand how I feel at the moment.Lastly, i love the smell!!!!! For some it may be too strong, but for me it's amazing. I washed my hair 2 days ago and it still smells amazing. My hair is still soft and manageable. I can comb through it with no issue. I immediately ordered another set because if this stuff runs out, I need it on hand!!!

Product: SheaMoisture Manuka Honey & Mafura Oil Intensive Hydration Shampoo & Conditioner | Set of 2 | 13 fl. Oz. each
Title: My hair can shine!
Review: Ok I have thin over colored , over permed , post menopausal hair.  I never thought I could find a shampoo and conditioner that could help it.  Yay I found it.  I read all the reviews and I was scared to try this after all the negative reviews.  I am so glad I tried it.  1 st let's address the smell many reviewers said it was to strong in the bottle it is indeed.  After using it is not as strong.  2nd lets address  "it dryed my hair out"  I did not have this experience my hair ONLY EVER had shine if I oiled it , I looked at my hair after shampooing twice and conditioning once and it was shiny , oh my this was amazing!  My longest hair at the back of my head clumps when wet , as I said over processed.  This still happened after shampooing and conditioning with this product.  The shampoo is rich and silky and felt more like conditioner than the conditioner did.  The conditioner is thick but is not creamy and slippery as I am used to most conditioners feeling.  I was worried that this would mean my hair would feel brittle and not soft when it dried.  I was pleasantly surprised that my curls were curlier and the SHINE !  I could have cried it has been 30 plus years since my hair has been shiny with nothing but shampoo and conditioner.  My hair is sooo soft and silky this is incredible to me 30 years of trying every product imaginable and my hair has NEVER been this soft.  I do not blow dry I have always let my hair dry naturally.  Hope this review helps anyone in doubt.  I have thin easily weighed down hair (this is why I perm) this product did not weigh my hair down.  The picture is what was my most dry ,brittle straw like ends.  This is what they looked like after 1 use.  Very pleased.

Product: SheaMoisture Manuka Honey & Mafura Oil Intensive Hydration Shampoo & Conditioner | Set of 2 | 13 fl. Oz. each
Title: matted my hair/ read ingredient list
Review: Hair type: 4a/ low porosity. I really wanted to like this product. Unfortunately this product line matted/ dried out my hair. I could not detangle/ comb through. I tried the entire product line (shampoo, conditioner, masque) and followed the directions listed. I used consistently for about 2-3 months just to make sure it was the product and not me doing something incorrectly. Same issue. FYI, for those with low porosity hair you might want to check the ingredient list on the back. I know that some people with low type of porosity have a sensitivity to protein. I noticed their is hydrolyzed rice protein in some/ most of Shea Moisture products and it may be why my hair reacted so badly. Hope this can someone else!!

Product: SheaMoisture Manuka Honey & Mafura Oil Intensive Hydration Shampoo & Conditioner | Set of 2 | 13 fl. Oz. each

Then i developed a rash behind my ears and behind my neck and the back of my nape area of my hair which is constantly itchy! this i believe is fake shea moisturizer for products and i want my damn money back

Product: SheaMoisture Manuka Honey & Mafura Oil Intensive Hydration Shampoo & Conditioner | Set of 2 | 13 fl. Oz. each
Title: Left â€œstuffâ€ on my hair.
Review: I was using Natureâ€™s Gate shampo and conditioner; however with them going out of business I had to find something to switch to. This came up as a suggested product on Amazon.The poduct came fast and in complete packaging without leaks.I noticed right away that the shampoo left some â€œstuffâ€ on my hair after rinsing. My hair did not feel clean. The conditioner made my hair feel soft and it felt hydrated. About a week into using it, I started getting pimples on my scalp. I stopped using it and the pimples healed and went away immediately. Iâ€™m glad it works for others, it didnâ€™t work for me.

Product: SheaMoisture Manuka Honey & Mafura Oil Intensive Hydration Shampoo & Conditioner | Set of 2 | 13 fl. Oz. each
Title: I'm used to using other products
Review: I used this one because I'm transitioning and it was the most recommended. I had hard water so it didn't take to my hair at first. After I got a water filter, it took better to my hair. Although, the generic Paul Mitchell tea tree conditioner I was using was much softer for my hair than this product. I'm thinking of switching back. This product did moisturize my hair but not nearly as much as my old conditioner. I usually have to leave 90% of the conditioner in my hair for it to absorb it the way I want. Even still, my hair would still be dry by the end of the day no matter how many moisturizing products i put in after wash and conditioning. I was disappointed that I switched to this brand because of the way my hair doesn't absorb it the way it did my generic brand. I was looking for something more natural and better for transitioning hair, but this didn't completely fulfill my expectations. I still required a lot more moisturizing products than what I'm used to.Don't get me wrong, it did do its job, just not 100%. It meet about 70% of my expectations. It's not entirely bad, but just not for my hair.

Product: SheaMoisture Manuka Honey & Mafura Oil Intensive Hydration Shampoo & Conditioner | Set of 2 | 13 fl. Oz. each
Title: Buy it!!!!!!
Review: Left my hair so soft and after deep conditioning my hair it even enhanced my curl pattern which doesnâ€™t always happen

Product: SheaMoisture Manuka Honey & Mafura Oil Intensive Hydration Shampoo & Conditioner | Set of 2 | 13 fl. Oz. each
Title: Completely strips my hair
Review: I'm not sure if this product is intended to strip your hair of all oils, but it really does for me. I've been using this for about three weeks now and my hair is SO dry. After using the shampoo/conditioner my usually smooth hair feels dry and haylike. Trying to brush my hair afterwards is a nightmare, because it's SO dry it gets extremely matted and tangled. Lastly, this shampoo strips my hair so much that it's pulling the dye out of my hair. I normally only have to dye my hair once every 2-3 months and that's usually just to touch up the roots only (even when using store brand sulfate shampoos). This has turned my hair from red to orange in three weeks. Definitely not the shampoo/conditioner for me.

Product: SheaMoisture Manuka Honey & Mafura Oil Intensive Hydration Shampoo & Conditioner | Set of 2 | 13 fl. Oz. each
Title: I had to cut my hair after using!
Review: I was really excited to try these products but it ended in disaster. The first time I used both of them my hair ended up very tangled . I thought it was just user error. The second time I used both the shampoo and conditioner it literally fused my hair at the ends!!! I couldnâ€™t detangle it at all. It was like it had glue mixed it with the products. I literally had to cut all my hair off!!! Ladies Iâ€™m talking shoulder length hair to like cut at my scalp!  I was so upset I thought I had a product that would work great for my 4c hair . I wasnâ€™t trying to go for a hair cut!

Product: SheaMoisture Manuka Honey & Mafura Oil Intensive Hydration Shampoo & Conditioner | Set of 2 | 13 fl. Oz. each
Title: Great other than shipping, few pumps of conditioner squirted out.
Review: I have been having problems finding a great shampoo for my fine, 3a/3b curly blonde hair that also works for my scalp. I'm a woman "of a certain age (45)" on HRT who also has some pretty extreme bouts of eczema. My scalp, since "the change" has decided to join the eczema party as well. I don't put products at my roots, and I only use a leave-in conditioner and flaxseed gel for styling. However, by the end of the day after I wash my hair, my scalp is itching like mad. I tried a different shampoo before this one mainly because of the reviews of the items arriving damaged. But the other shampoo/conditioner didn't do the trick, so I decided to give this a try. It's amazing, and I'm glad I did try it, however, it did come open during shipping and the conditioner squirted all over the inside. About 3 pumps worth. However, I am really loving the product, and after just 2 washes I notice a huge difference in my scalp and my hair. It works awesome for my curls and I can wash my hair every other day without scratching all night the night before I shower. I'm pleased, and I recommend!

Product: SheaMoisture Manuka Honey & Mafura Oil Intensive Hydration Shampoo & Conditioner | Set of 2 | 13 fl. Oz. each
Title: Not so great
Review: Was hoping for a great new product to try with more natural Ingredients but didnâ€™t have a good experience here. First the package arrived damaged and the shampoo was leaking but I just let it go. After many uses I realized the product was leaving heavy residue in my hair. I thought maybe I wasnâ€™t rinsing properly but not the case after several washes. It leaves a heavy feel in my hair and makes my hair look dark and dirty when it is in fact clean. The smell isnâ€™t the best either and the bottles are teeny tiny. I wonâ€™t be repurchasing.

Product: SheaMoisture Manuka Honey & Mafura Oil Intensive Hydration Shampoo & Conditioner | Set of 2 | 13 fl. Oz. each
Title: it was like I had a new head of hair
Review: I was looking for a product that would get rid of product buildup. Prior to using Shea moisturizer, after showering, my hair felt sticky and would look greasy when dry. After my first use with Shea moisturizer, my wet hair felt incredibly soft.  And after I dried it, it was like I had a new head of hair. Iâ€™m in love with this set.  It smells like itâ€™s would be good enough to eat. The only con, and itâ€™s very minor, is that the shampoo doesnâ€™t lather up a lot. I had a hard time feeling like it was getting to my scalp. But otherwise, 5 stars all the way. Iâ€™ll definitely be buying more when I start to run low.

Product: SheaMoisture Manuka Honey & Mafura Oil Intensive Hydration Shampoo & Conditioner | Set of 2 | 13 fl. Oz. each
Title: Smells amazing but leaves a bit of a film on my hair always
Review: This set contains some fig scent and it's amazing. My hair smells so nice in and out of the shower. But I have been underwhelmed with how my hair feels when I use this product. It usually feels like it didn't quite rinse out all the way, like someone forgot to rinse the conditioner out or something. I have tried using much less, tried rinsing more, tried rinsing in cold, tried it with and without a hair dryer afterwards, etc. It always has a kind of waxy feel that isn't very nice. I do live in the south and it's very humid. But I have had this same trouble with other varieties of Shea Moisture products and I don't have it with some other brands.If you generally get on with this brand, though, this one smells SO good. I'm really sad it isn't working out for me.

Product: SheaMoisture Manuka Honey & Mafura Oil Intensive Hydration Shampoo & Conditioner | Set of 2 | 13 fl. Oz. each
Title: EXCELLENT product for dry, bleached, curly or fine hair
Review: First, this stuff smells absolutely AMAZING. Next, it has worked wonders on smoothing and conditioning my 12-year old son's shoulder length curly hair (he's a rock band drummer ;) It has also worked wonders on smoothing and moisturizing my platinum bleached, fine hair. I've noticed A LOT less breakage and a bunch of new growth around my hairline. I highly recommend this product for anyone that has curly, fine, bleached or just generally dry/frizzy hair.

Product: SheaMoisture Manuka Honey & Mafura Oil Intensive Hydration Shampoo & Conditioner | Set of 2 | 13 fl. Oz. each
Title: Great product but regrattably not for me.
Review: This is a great shampoo and conditioner combination for my type 4 combination high porosity hair.Didn't too much care for the texture of the shampoo but once the conditioner hits your hair, it makes up for it. Both the shampoo and conditioner have a strong scent that I didn't care too much for.I would have easily continued using these because of how moisturized and soft they made my hair but one (or more) of the ingredients leaves my face and neck with a rash every time I use it.While I won't continue using, I will recommend trying these products given how great they make your hair feel.

Product: SheaMoisture Manuka Honey & Mafura Oil Intensive Hydration Shampoo & Conditioner | Set of 2 | 13 fl. Oz. each
Title: Finally a product that WORKS for natural black hair.
Review: I have natural kinky hair and usually wear a twist out or basic Afro. When I washed my hair in the past I had difficulty managing it to style and care for my scalp. The first time I used this shampoo, I was able to immediately feel how soft my hair was. I could run a comb through it. Then I conditioned and rinsed and my kink looked amazing. Still kinky (as I wanted) but my curls had BODY. I could part and twist with no resistance or much breakage when styled wet or dry. I wash every 9 days and my hair is thriving. It's no longer dry and my ends are properly moisturized.

Product: SheaMoisture Manuka Honey & Mafura Oil Intensive Hydration Shampoo & Conditioner | Set of 2 | 13 fl. Oz. each
Title: Spilled in the bag a little.
Review: The two of them were together in a vacuum sealed piece of plastic.  Unfortunately some of the conditioner managed to get out of the bottle and were all over them, but it wasn't very much and the plastic was enough to keep it from getting on anything else in the box.So far it's working as intended and I think it's doing a little better for my hair than my last shampoo/conditioner combination, but I have really difficult hair so it's not a complete solution.  It smells nice and doesn't leave any residue as far as I can tell, and I tend to use a lot of it.  I don't know how well it works if you use it as a leave-in conditioner, it doesn't really seemed designed for that so I just put it on first thing and then wash it out before I leave the shower.

Product: SheaMoisture Manuka Honey & Mafura Oil Intensive Hydration Shampoo & Conditioner | Set of 2 | 13 fl. Oz. each
Title: This brand is going downhill fast!
Review: The scent is the only amazing thing about these products. I have 4A type hair. This mess turned my hair 4C. The shampoo felt like it was stripping my hair when I was washing it, I thought the conditionioner would make up for that. My hair has never been so dry and unmanageable. My leave in conditioners couldn't even moisten my hair after I used this. I always air dry my hair after putting in a leave in conditioner. This routine leaves my curls soft and bouncy. After using this shampoo and conditioner combo in my routine, my hair was crunchy and dry. I'm throwing this crap in the garbage. I don't want my daughter to ruin her beautiful hair like I did mine.

Product: SheaMoisture Manuka Honey & Mafura Oil Intensive Hydration Shampoo & Conditioner | Set of 2 | 13 fl. Oz. each
Title: It's Everything!
Review: I use Shea Moisture's other line, Jamaican Black Castor Oil Line for damaged hair, I really liked that, but I find that the Intense Hydration line works better for my hair. It's more manageable (sleek, moisturized). It smells sooo good! It's everything. I wish there was more in the bottle though. Their Jamaican Black Castor set usually comes with more product in the bottle. I have kinky afro textured hair, but I'm sure it'll work for anyone needing more moisture and/or hydration.

Product: SheaMoisture Manuka Honey & Mafura Oil Intensive Hydration Shampoo & Conditioner | Set of 2 | 13 fl. Oz. each
Title: DONT WASTE YOUR MONEY!! It Destroys your hair; word of mouth Advertising is EXTREMELY MISLEADING
Review: The absolute WORST product for my hair. Deceitful word of mouth, has been doing their advertising. DONT believe the HYPE. This product  will DESTROY your hair. Your hair will become brittle, extremely dry and DULL

Product: SheaMoisture Manuka Honey & Mafura Oil Intensive Hydration Shampoo & Conditioner | Set of 2 | 13 fl. Oz. each
Title: Very Mild
Review: I really would give this shampoo and conditioner 3.5 stars.  It is good gentle shampoo, lathers oaky and has a nice scent.  My only con to these products is that they did not keep my hair clean for long.  For some reason, my hair was dirty the next day and I don't like washing it everyday.  I usually wash every other day, which I thought was healthier for my hair.  So, having said all of that I think this shampoo and conditioner does not strip your hair of its natural oils so that is a big plus.  I am happy with this shampoo and conditioner as very mild and gentle on my thin hair.

Product: SheaMoisture Manuka Honey & Mafura Oil Intensive Hydration Shampoo & Conditioner | Set of 2 | 13 fl. Oz. each
Title: Not my cup of tea
Review: This is just not a good product for my hair, especially the shampoo.  It leaves a very heavy waxy film (sp?) on my hair.  It is so heavy that I could not even dry my hair all the way with my hairdryer - the wax covered my wet hair (especially close to the scalp/at the roots) and trapped the moisture in.  My hair at the scalp felt super coarse and oily and left a residue on my hand.  Now, I know how to rinse out my hair and I actually try to use very little shampoo, so it's not like I put on too much product and didn't rinse properly.  It took a good 2-3 shampoos with head and shoulders shampoo to get the film off of my hair.  I've tried other SheaMoisture products, but this was one was so different and I returned it right away.

Product: SheaMoisture Manuka Honey & Mafura Oil Intensive Hydration Shampoo & Conditioner | Set of 2 | 13 fl. Oz. each
Title: Too Drying
Review: I use a lot of SheaMoisture products. I've had great luck with body wash and lotions, but no luck with hair products. I have tried many hair product options and have been disappointed. This one was no exception. I found this product dried out my hair. It did not leave it soft at all and when left to air dry or blow dry, the result was a mount of frizz. I was hoping the manuka honey and mafura oil would provide intensive moisture, but for my hair - which was only slightly damaged from color and heating tools became drier, more frizzy and took on a severely damaged appearance, and left it feeling like straw.

Product: SheaMoisture Manuka Honey & Mafura Oil Intensive Hydration Shampoo & Conditioner | Set of 2 | 13 fl. Oz. each
Title: Bye, Bye Dry and Brittle Hair!
Review: If you have suffered from dry brittle hair that always seems to break off, then this is the shampoo and conditioner for you! I have 4A hair and I have always struggled to keep my hair hydrated. Since I have been using this product I have seen a lot of progress in my hair. It looks healthy and is growing since it's not breaking off. The product has a great smell as well!

Product: SheaMoisture Manuka Honey & Mafura Oil Intensive Hydration Shampoo & Conditioner | Set of 2 | 13 fl. Oz. each
Title: Love this!!!
Review: I recently had been using an awful shampoo and conditioner that was making my hair fall out, so while doing some research online I found this brand. Immediately looking at the reviews I see the mixed reactions, I also notice that this shampoo and conditioner are made for type 4 hair, which I do not have. Also while looking at the review I see that this is a cleansing shampoo/conditioner so it will take all of the things that drug store shampoos/conditioners make your hair shiny out. I took a chance on this and after a few washes I notice my hair is still soft and smooth (Iâ€™ve had it about 2 weeks). It gives my hair great volume, leaves it moisturized but not greasy, and looks great between washes longer than any other shampoo/conditioner combination I have ever used before. Also my hair is no longer falling out (thank goodness)! I HIGHLY recommend this product!

Product: SheaMoisture Manuka Honey & Mafura Oil Intensive Hydration Shampoo & Conditioner | Set of 2 | 13 fl. Oz. each
Title: I absolutely love this shampoo and conditioner combo!
Review: I have used many types of shampoos and this one surpasses all of them easily in all areas.I will start off with my hair type being a 2b/2c.  This shampoo is wonderful smelling and leaves me refreshed after a shower!  Is also leaves my hair so right that it's even wavier/curly than usual without it!  I love that because my hair is nice!!Get this if you have wavey or curly hair and I promise you you'll be satisfied.

Product: SheaMoisture Manuka Honey & Mafura Oil Intensive Hydration Shampoo & Conditioner | Set of 2 | 13 fl. Oz. each
Title: First wash so good!
Review: I am a male with straight short-medium low-porosity hair that has always looked dry, especially in the winter months. I found this product set after doing some research on what's best for my hair type. I took my first wash the day after receiving mine and my hair has never looked more healthy and that's just one wash. It's got shine, bounce, and richer in color. I can't imagine how nice it'll look after continued use.

Product: SheaMoisture Manuka Honey & Mafura Oil Intensive Hydration Shampoo & Conditioner | Set of 2 | 13 fl. Oz. each
Title: gross Smells Disgusting the smell is overbearring
Review: I dont know what fragrance they put on the shampoo but its very very strong and it smells like really cheap man cologne from the dollar store I couldn't even try it the smell was making me dizzy had to return it didnt even want to try it i didn't want my hair to smell this bad my dogs shampoo smells better than this.On another note The texture was very creamy from the shampoo and the conditioner looked very thick but I didn't put it on my hair so thats all I can say about the product.

Product: SheaMoisture Manuka Honey & Mafura Oil Intensive Hydration Shampoo & Conditioner | Set of 2 | 13 fl. Oz. each
Title: I WILL NEVER USE ANYTHING ELSE
Review: I have tried many products on my son's 4b 4c mix hair. His hair gets so dry. When we first bought it, we had more of his old shampoo left over but when we ran out of the old shampoo, I was reluctant to use something new. I just did a quick wash with this shampoo, and I was completely blown away at how soft and hydrated his hair was! And the scent is lovely! We will never use anything else.

Product: SheaMoisture Manuka Honey & Mafura Oil Intensive Hydration Shampoo & Conditioner | Set of 2 | 13 fl. Oz. each
Title: It's already working wonders
Review: I can already tell a difference in my hair. I usually wear wigs so I normally get my hair braided. I wasn't taking care of my hair so it was breathing off bad. My hairdresser told me to try this and even after the first week of my using it I could tell a difference. The breakage is at a minimum so yes I'll be buying this product again.

Product: SheaMoisture Manuka Honey & Mafura Oil Intensive Hydration Shampoo & Conditioner | Set of 2 | 13 fl. Oz. each
Title: Soft and fragrant
Review: I have thick, 3c-4a hair. It's about 4-5 inches long.Starting with the shampoo, it's pretty mild, but great at getting rid of buildup. It only takes 1 shampoo to get my scalp clean. It doesn't leave my hair too dry either.The conditioner worked well too! It left my hair fragrant and soft. Rather moisturized as well.

Product: SheaMoisture Manuka Honey & Mafura Oil Intensive Hydration Shampoo & Conditioner | Set of 2 | 13 fl. Oz. each
Title: Absolutely saved my hair!
Review: I have been bleaching my hair for 20+ years and as such, they were in rough shape. Very thin, breaking constantly, no amount of trimming would prevent split ends, and absolutely no shine. Shea products changed that immediately! Gave my hair that rescue it desperately needed. My hair is slowly transforming and never looked better. Note to those with thin hair: since it provides so much moisture, it can make your hair a bit oily quite fast, however nothing dry shampoo canâ€™t fix. Also, you can apply the conditioner to the ends only to prevent that. But trust me, you will love this combo if your hair is truly desperate for cure :))

Product: SheaMoisture Manuka Honey & Mafura Oil Intensive Hydration Shampoo & Conditioner | Set of 2 | 13 fl. Oz. each
Title: 5.0 out of 5 stars
Review: This shampoo lathers and cleanses my daughter hair really good. The conditioner softens her hair and detangles it as well. The scent is nice and not too overwhelming. It leaves her hair moisturized and bouncy. This set is a great value for the quality, size of bottles, how it performs in her hair and price.

Product: SheaMoisture Manuka Honey & Mafura Oil Intensive Hydration Shampoo & Conditioner | Set of 2 | 13 fl. Oz. each
Title: 10000% recommend no harmful chemicals in if
Review: Love love love this shampoo and conditioner. Recently learned of dimethicone being a hair loss and cancer causing  agent  when heat is applied and discovered it was in all of my hair products( it was causing my alopecia). Looking for alternatives I stumbled upon this and was thrilled with how much healthier my hair has been looking. Their arenâ€™t any harmful ingredients and I have a bounce back in my hair. No brittle snapping ends, just happy healthy hair. 100% recommend so moisturizing to your hair.

Product: SheaMoisture Manuka Honey & Mafura Oil Intensive Hydration Shampoo & Conditioner | Set of 2 | 13 fl. Oz. each
Title: Wonderful!
Review: Arguably one of the best shampoos and and conditioners on the market, and Iâ€™ve tried them ALL!  With daily use, this has helped restore my fine coarse 4c hair to a much better state of health.  I wear a lot of braids and protective styles that deprive my hair of moisture.  Using this time in quarantine due to the COVID-19 pandemic to bring my hair back to life.  Highly recommend, especially for those with natural textures.

Product: SheaMoisture Manuka Honey & Mafura Oil Intensive Hydration Shampoo & Conditioner | Set of 2 | 13 fl. Oz. each
Title: Amazing!
Review: I bought this product for my daughter who has coarse curly hair, and when I saw how beautiful and shiny her hair became after just a week, I decided to use it myself. I have black straight coarse hair and this product transformed my irritated scalp! It moisturized my scalp and my hair is smooth and shiny! I recommend this product to everyone! Use a small amount of shampoo once, rinse and repeat though, for best results.

Product: SheaMoisture Manuka Honey & Mafura Oil Intensive Hydration Shampoo & Conditioner | Set of 2 | 13 fl. Oz. each
Title: Fabulous results!
Review: This product line is the best I have ever used.  The SheaMoisture Manuka Honey & Mafura Oil Intensive Hydration Shampoo & Conditioner has made my hair soft, shiny and bouncy! : )  I am going on 70 years old and my hair is fine with a little natural waviness.  Even though  I don't use dyes, hairspray or heated styling tools my hair started feeling dry and becoming frizzy.  After using these products my hair now looks sleek and has weight to it.  As mentioned previously, it has a bounce to it and after using spongy rollers my hair keeps the curl.  FABUULOUS!! Thank you. : ) Joanne

Product: SheaMoisture Manuka Honey & Mafura Oil Intensive Hydration Shampoo & Conditioner | Set of 2 | 13 fl. Oz. each
Title: Meh
Review: I bought this because I'm following the curly girl method for my very curly hair. First time I used this shampoo and conditioner, it was fine, but now, by the third or fourth time, my hair feels rather dry. Not really keen on the scent, either, as it tends toward a strong musk, and I prefer citrusy or floral scents.

Product: SheaMoisture Manuka Honey & Mafura Oil Intensive Hydration Shampoo & Conditioner | Set of 2 | 13 fl. Oz. each
Title: Would like a replacement
Review: I don't know how the item works but half of it spilled all over the shipping box along with all the other things I bought. I would like the item replaced so I can actually try it. Going to just throw this mess away

Product: SheaMoisture Manuka Honey & Mafura Oil Intensive Hydration Shampoo & Conditioner | Set of 2 | 13 fl. Oz. each
Title: Worst product I ever used!!!
Review: Doesn't deserve 1 star rating either. My daughter had nice curly hair and I bought this because I heard this is a moisturizing shampoo and sulfate free. But this shampoo ruined my daughter's hair, made it super dry and gave her dry scalp for which we had to consult a dermatologist. DO NOT BUY THIS PRODUCT!!!!!!!!!

Product: SheaMoisture Manuka Honey & Mafura Oil Intensive Hydration Shampoo & Conditioner | Set of 2 | 13 fl. Oz. each
Title: Too heavy and left hair flat
Review: I have been using this for a few months now and itâ€™s just too heavy and leaves my hair flat.I have medium length, dark, semi frizzy, wavyish, Hispanic hair with some split ends. My hair has minimal heat tool exposure and is naturally processed with henna hair dye from Lush. Dry hair and some dry scale as of lately. I swim in the pool so some sun and bleach exposure recently. I use soft scrunches to tie my hair.The conditioner leaves my hair flat at the top and dry at the bottom even if you only use 1 pump and only put at the bottom of my hair. I have more split ends but not sure why. If you have thick dry hair than this is perfect but if you have fine to medium hair this may be too heavy for you. It was for me.

Product: SheaMoisture Manuka Honey & Mafura Oil Intensive Hydration Shampoo & Conditioner | Set of 2 | 13 fl. Oz. each
Title: Not for my scalp my scalp was itching really bad
Review: This shampoo is really high with perfume and perfume equals alcohol my scalp was burning for weeks after 1 time of me using this shampoo and conditioner. If you have sensitive scalp like I do donâ€™t use this products.

Product: SheaMoisture Manuka Honey & Mafura Oil Intensive Hydration Shampoo & Conditioner | Set of 2 | 13 fl. Oz. each
Title: Good product, left my hair soft and moisturized
Review: I like all of this line of shampoo and conditioner and they are the only one I use. This is not my favorite of this brand but its still very good- moisturizing with healthy ingredients, just did not give me the body I need for my fine hair, but still is great. Delivery was perfect too, thnx!

Product: SheaMoisture Manuka Honey & Mafura Oil Intensive Hydration Shampoo & Conditioner | Set of 2 | 13 fl. Oz. each
Title: Great product but low on scent
Review: I love how these products make my hair feel!  My only complaint is the size of the bottles and the scent.  The scent is too subtle. I was hoping for a very fragrant scent. That being said, no scent is better than a terrible or over powering one.  Second, the bottle seemed on the small side. The actual product felt great, lathered well and left my hair feeling very hydrated.

Product: SheaMoisture Manuka Honey & Mafura Oil Intensive Hydration Shampoo & Conditioner | Set of 2 | 13 fl. Oz. each
Title: Love these hair products!
Review: I do hair for fashion shows and use these for myself. Several mature models asked how my gray hair looks so soft and silky. Once they begin using these products, I can tell how their hair changes. Great product line, and does not weigh down your hair!

Product: SheaMoisture Manuka Honey & Mafura Oil Intensive Hydration Shampoo & Conditioner | Set of 2 | 13 fl. Oz. each
Title: Not for me
Review: I like SheaMoisture products. This was my first 1st purchase of their shampoo and conditioner. I am not a fan of thisscent and how it reacts on my hair. It could just be a personal preference, but I would not purchase this again.

Product: SheaMoisture Manuka Honey & Mafura Oil Intensive Hydration Shampoo & Conditioner | Set of 2 | 13 fl. Oz. each
Title: Issa Yes
Review: Okay, wow. After all I tried for my dense low porosity 4c hair (which we all know is one of the driest hair types) I used Cantu, Creme of Nature, etc, but nothing comes close to how soft and moisturized this product left my hair. And the conditioner smells AMAZING. Everything else usually would leave my hair feeling stripped, dry, and tangled, but this is definitely coming through. The definition I seen in my curls after using just the shampoo kinda blew my mind lol. The reviews did scare me a bit, but hey, everyone's hair reacts to things differently, and mine just so happen to love it. Issa yes.

Product: SheaMoisture Manuka Honey & Mafura Oil Intensive Hydration Shampoo & Conditioner | Set of 2 | 13 fl. Oz. each
Title: A must have for moisture
Review: Excellent product for my 3C/4A low porosity high density hair. My go to for moisture- intensive wash days. I use this one day per week and follow up with the hydration hair masque. My hair feels undeniably moist and ready for styling. Since using this i have not had a bad hair day.

Product: SheaMoisture Manuka Honey & Mafura Oil Intensive Hydration Shampoo & Conditioner | Set of 2 | 13 fl. Oz. each
Title: This shampoo and conditioner has done AMAZING things for her hair
Review: I purchased this for mine and my 4 year old's curly hair, trying to add some moisture. While my hair feels healthier, it holds water forever after I wash now, it feels greasy as soon as it dries. My 4 year old's hair feels crunchy and gunky when it dries.However, my 6 year old has stone straight, stringy hair that frequently gets a frizzy spot in the back moments after its brushed. This shampoo and conditioner has done AMAZING things for her hair. It's smooth, feels healthier, and stays polished looking after its brushed. Her hair does not feel greasy or gunky in the slightest. I suppose it's all about the hair type. I will definitely continue purchasing it for her and will be recommending it to her grandmother who has similar hair.

Product: SheaMoisture Manuka Honey & Mafura Oil Intensive Hydration Shampoo & Conditioner | Set of 2 | 13 fl. Oz. each
Title: Pump defective
Review: After purchasing this on 1st Ar 2019i was so excited to use this conditioner on the hair. Though it contains all natural ingredients and keeps your hair soft and healthy. After just two uses, the pump has become defective and the conditioner is not coming out of the pump. I cant even return as the return window has been closed on 11th

Product: SheaMoisture Manuka Honey & Mafura Oil Intensive Hydration Shampoo & Conditioner | Set of 2 | 13 fl. Oz. each
Title: Great shampoo evil conditioner lol
Review: The shampoo leave your hair so soft until you put the condition the conditioner feels like you grabbed body lotion and put it on your hair or if you pour some dish soap.. I never return things but I already started the return process for this.. is a no no for me.. so sad

Product: SheaMoisture Manuka Honey & Mafura Oil Intensive Hydration Shampoo & Conditioner | Set of 2 | 13 fl. Oz. each
Title: This is not for fine straight hair! maybe curly or black hair.
Review: I love the smell and how soft my hair is after using but it's far too heavy for my straight thin hair. after using it three times in a row, my scalp was itching. I think i can get away with using it twice a month. I don't want to just trash it.

Product: SheaMoisture Manuka Honey & Mafura Oil Intensive Hydration Shampoo & Conditioner | Set of 2 | 13 fl. Oz. each

Review: White girl herewith super straight super dry postmenopausal hair, spending a lot of time outdoors in the New Mexico sun. Argan oil and Shea always work well in my hair, and I wanted something really deep conditioning. This stuff is awesome, my hair feels like hair instead of like it's about to break off.

Product: SheaMoisture Manuka Honey & Mafura Oil Intensive Hydration Shampoo & Conditioner | Set of 2 | 13 fl. Oz. each
Title: Packaging Hiccup!ðŸ¥º

Product: SheaMoisture Manuka Honey & Mafura Oil Intensive Hydration Shampoo & Conditioner | Set of 2 | 13 fl. Oz. each

Product: SheaMoisture Manuka Honey & Mafura Oil Intensive Hydration Shampoo & Conditioner | Set of 2 | 13 fl. Oz. each
Title: Ehh
Review: I think that for the right person this product might work well but for my wavy hair it seemed very heavy and the smell was overpowering and unappealing. This is coming from someone who isn't sensitive when it comes to scents.

Product: SheaMoisture Manuka Honey & Mafura Oil Intensive Hydration Shampoo & Conditioner | Set of 2 | 13 fl. Oz. each

If  your hair is already oily prone, I would not recommend it. smells great and using a little hair conditioning especially on the ends feels very nice on my hair. My hair is not oily prone but I have to be mindful of the amount I use so it does not get oily.

Product: SheaMoisture Manuka Honey & Mafura Oil Intensive Hydration Shampoo & Conditioner | Set of 2 | 13 fl. Oz. each
Title: Perfect for all hair types!
Review: I love all of Shea Moisture's products, but this shampoo/conditioner is my favorite. I have long normal thickness dark brown hair, and this product has done wonders for my hair. My hair has never been shinier, or healthier after a year of using this product. You won't regret ordering this product, I will never use anything else!

Product: SheaMoisture Manuka Honey & Mafura Oil Intensive Hydration Shampoo & Conditioner | Set of 2 | 13 fl. Oz. each
Title: Best drugstore shampoo!
Review: My hair is perpetually dry and very thick i went on a very long hunt for a good shampoo that didnâ€™t break the bank and this is where i landed. My hair is soft, it smells good and its made with good ingredients!

Product: SheaMoisture Manuka Honey & Mafura Oil Intensive Hydration Shampoo & Conditioner | Set of 2 | 13 fl. Oz. each
Title: Best Shea Moisture line ever.
Review: This is the favorite Shea Moisture line ever. The shampoo is so moisturizing. My hair feels wonderful and soft when finished. The conditioner is just as wonderful. I donâ€™t experience a lot of shedding. There is a light scent. When Iâ€™m done my hair is super soft and not dry or stripped like some other shampoo/conditioners. The products are thick.

Product: SheaMoisture Manuka Honey & Mafura Oil Intensive Hydration Shampoo & Conditioner | Set of 2 | 13 fl. Oz. each
Title: Not what I expected.
Review: In all fairness I have to say â€œit comes down to personal preference and lack of fulfillment for the customerâ€. Its not bad just not what I expected.  It takes a little while for the suds so be sure your hair is very wet and youâ€™ll use less. Itâ€™s very rich in suds once it gets going. Could be expensive in the long run for thick, long hair.

Product: SheaMoisture Manuka Honey & Mafura Oil Intensive Hydration Shampoo & Conditioner | Set of 2 | 13 fl. Oz. each
Title: Left my family's hair worse than before
Review: These products made myself and my family's hair and scalp worse than it was before.. it made our hair very dry, brittle, dull, frizzy and gave everyone the worst dandruff, dry itchy scalp, and very painful red flaky patches all over! Product: SheaMoisture Manuka Honey & Mafura Oil Intensive Hydration Shampoo & Conditioner | Set of 2 | 13 fl. Oz. each
Title: About to scratch a hole in my head.
Review: This product made my hair/scalp worse. I first purchased this item because based on the reviews it will help with my itchy scalp. NOPE it didn't help it actually made it worse. I feel like I'm about to scratch a hole in my head. My hair feels like when you been swimming in the pool and get out it has that rough sticky texture.... yes that's how my hair feels now. I wish I can get my money back for this crap.

Product: SheaMoisture Manuka Honey & Mafura Oil Intensive Hydration Shampoo & Conditioner | Set of 2 | 13 fl. Oz. each
Title: Works well for my curls.

Review: I dont like the way it smells.This product also make my hair very knotty.Gave the rest to a friend to see if she likes it as I dont want it to be wasted but I will no longer be using it.

Product: SheaMoisture Manuka Honey & Mafura Oil Intensive Hydration Shampoo & Conditioner | Set of 2 | 13 fl. Oz. each
Title: No more "Fragrance" please!!
Review: So, this is just my experience, but I've been staying away from most Shampoos for about 5 years now. For a long time I used stuff only scented with Essential oils, but I decided to try this stuff. Now, it my fault because I didn't pay attention to this having fragrance oils as the main scent. BUT, I didn't think it would be this strong... The smell is good, don't get me wrong. It's been years since my hair has smelled good so I enjoyed that aspect, but every time I use this product I wake up with asthma at night. I haven't changed anything else... So this is all I can think of that is causing it- fragrance can cause people to have asthma attacks in general. So, while everything else about the product seems great, I used it for about 6 days and my hair is soft and it has stopped falling out/breaking off as much (that will be the topic of my review of another brand of shampoo, haha!), but as soon as I stop using the stuff I can sleep without waking up to clogged airways. Otherwise, seems like a decent product, just wish they'd take out the fragrance!  So, again, this is my experience, I have no idea if it will cause anyone else to have problems, but I just can't give it a good rating if it causes this much of an issue for me.

Product: SheaMoisture Manuka Honey & Mafura Oil Intensive Hydration Shampoo & Conditioner | Set of 2 | 13 fl. Oz. each
Title: Great for Scalp as Well as Hair!
Review: I'm really impressed with the Shea Moisture Intensive Hydration set. I have long, wavy/curly, frizzy hair and it's actually helping me with the frizz, when few products have ever done that before, especially since I added in a weekly treatment of this lines deep conditioning mask. The scent is really subtle and I think it's a lovely all natural scent, sort of like honey.  Also, I have a problem with psoriasis on my scalp, it causes me the most severe itch, and I've tried countless things to help relieve it and nothing ever has. Honestly, since I've started using this line the itch has dramatically improved! I think it's because the ingredients are all natural and moisturizing, good for not just the hair but the scalp as well!

Title: Happily surprised, now a faithful Shea Moisture fan
Review: I bought this shampoo and conditioner at a store when I was out of town, not knowing anything about it, but I liked that it contains Manuka honey.I am amazed at how little product I need to use at a time, and how much I love it. Somehow, my hair is staying cleaner, longer!About a month later my daughter saw it in the shower and mentioned that Shea Moisture is a favorite among many of her associates in the health and wellness community. So, I get to be one of the cool kids (in my mind, ha!) ...but seriously, my daughter et al only confirmed what I already knew. This is good stuff, and a set of shampoo & conditioner, 13 ounces each, lasts me at least 4 months.*My hair has some highlights as well as loose perm. I occasionally use a hot blow dryer, but not often. It seems to have no damage whatsoever, so I am quite sold on Shea Moisture.

Product: SheaMoisture Manuka Honey & Mafura Oil Intensive Hydration Shampoo & Conditioner | Set of 2 | 13 fl. Oz. each
Title: HORRIBLE CHEMICAL FRAGRANCE THAT GAVE ME AN AWFUL HEADACHE!
Review: For anyone that is sensitive to chemicals and fragrances, DO NOT USE THIS PRODUCT!!! I ordered this shampoo and conditioner because the description said it was all natural and the fragrance was from essential oils. When I looked at the label later I realized this is untrue as it states fragrance in the ingredients. It took me a full week to get the stench out of my hair and that was only after shampooing it about 10 times, and that includes twice with scent blocking shampoos!! None of those worked so then I soaked my hair in olive oil so I couldn't smell the horrible fragrance. When I rinsed that out I could still smell it so I soaked it with olive oil again. Then I rinsed it, shampooed, covered in baking soda and rinsed in apple cider vinegar. When I got out of the shower I couldn't smell it as badly, but once my hair dried it was super stinky again. I even drove around in our Jeep for an hour, hoping the wind would blow the stench out! My husband who is not sensitive could barely stand to be around me. The smell was so strong that any time I would move at night it would wake me up!!! It gave me the worst headache. You have to wonder what in the world they are putting in it to make the smell last so long. Definitely nothing natural!!!! Extremely disgusted with this product!

I highly recommend.

Title: Great product if your hair has oil but skip this one if your hair is dry
Review: This product did not work well for my hair but my daughter loves it for hers.  I have naturally blonde, fine, curly hair and oil is basically non-existent on my hair.  I need something that really moisturizes.  I love their soaps as they really make my skin feel great and I thought this product would do for my hair what the soap does for my skin.  Unfortunately, my hair was ok after first use, dry after the second and horrible after the third use.  My daughter has oilier hair so I gave the product to her to try.  She loves it.  She says her hair feels great.  I will say the smell is amazing.  So my recommendation would be if you have hair that has oil for this to work with you will love it.  If your hair is dry, try another product.

I don't know who this product was made for but it sure  wasn't made for my extra curly 4c hair. If I could return it I would but I have already used it twice, only to see if it would get better (it didn't). Also, and I thing this is the most important thing, it made my hair fall out!!!! I wouldn't give this to my worse enemy, well maybe worst enemy because I'm petty like that.

Product: SheaMoisture Manuka Honey & Mafura Oil Intensive Hydration Shampoo & Conditioner | Set of 2 | 13 fl. Oz. each
Title: Mmm honey
Review: Can my hair being too soft be an issue?I really like this shampoo and conditioner combo. My hair is very very soft after I use this stuff and although that's what most people desire, I can't get as much volume as I'd like. If you're looking to control frizzy curls, this stuff works great. If you need a bit of frizz to keep your style, then this works a little too well. Now I need more product to achieve my signature look, but it's worth it.I like this combo much more than the coconut/hibiscus one. The shampoo actually lathers when I use it and the conditioner does a great job at detangling and moisturizing afterward. And although this might be arbitrary to the experience, the smell is AMAZING. It smells like honey and oil: very fragrant but not overwhelming.I've only used it a couple of times so far, but so far I'm pretty happy with the results. Also, at $10 each, I think it's a great deal.

Product: SheaMoisture Manuka Honey & Mafura Oil Intensive Hydration Shampoo & Conditioner | Set of 2 | 13 fl. Oz. each
Title: Heavenly scent of the tropics
Review: I bought this set after reading some very positive reviews.  My hair is very thick and leans toward being coarse.  I used this for the first time after being in the hospital for several days.  My hair desperately needed a shampoo.  After the first lather, my hair felt clean and soft, but I wanted to be sure, so I lathered up again.  My hair felt really good then!  I like the consistency of the shampoo as well as that heavenly scent.  Men could easily use this product, and I hope some do.  The conditioner leaves a bit to be desired, but it's okay.  It's not as thick as I would have liked, and it didn't quite smooth my hair out as much as I would have liked.  That said, I will continue to use it.  I really liked the fact that the pump on the conditioner locks so it can be taken when travelling.  I wonder why they didn't put one on the shampoo?

Title: Dry Over-processed Hair

Product: SheaMoisture Manuka Honey & Mafura Oil Intensive Hydration Shampoo & Conditioner | Set of 2 | 13 fl. Oz. each
Title: Not cleaning, breakage, frizz, doesn't wash out
Review: I used this for over a year, because I tend to have skin reactions to a lot of stuff and had started getting an itchy scalp. I finally got so frustrated by the amount of breakage and frizz in my hair from this, so I switched to a mainstream brand which claims to have less added bs (ever pure). After one use of a different brand, I was blown away by how horrible this product line was for my hair. It also never seemed to wash out, always having bubbles leftover in the tub after Conditioning. I've also noticed that I now don't need to wash my hair as much because it's ACTUALLY getting cleaned by using a different brand finally. I feel so poorly leaving such a bad review, but also tried other variations from this brand and they were equally bad. I can say I do love the body wash, which is why I gave the hair products a try. Please consider the body wash and other products, but this was worse than I had thought. It left me feeling like I needed more crap in my hair to fix the frizz and breakage, which then never got washed out and built up. ðŸ˜”

Forget about blow drying it! It looked super greasy. If you do use it i suggest taking a break once a week to use clarifying shampoo. Hope this helps!

Product: SheaMoisture Manuka Honey & Mafura Oil Intensive Hydration Shampoo & Conditioner | Set of 2 | 13 fl. Oz. each
Title: It was terrible. I had to use a curling iron to ...
Review: This conditioner saved my naturally curly hair. My hair started to get dry and the curls started to straighten out and look frizzy. It was terrible. I had to use a curling iron to fix all the half straight parts, which then dried out my hair more. I started using this conditioner after a saw how shiny and silky it made a friend of mine's hair. Her hair is thick and curly like mine. I have to say, it changed my hair. I don't need to curl it anymore. Because my hair is so thick, after I rinse it out, I leave in an ever so small amount just to keep the curls soft and protect from the diffuser heat. It just needed the hydration that this product provided. Once a week I use the hair mask while I shower for extra hydration. I have recommended it to all my friends with thick, curly hair.

Product: SheaMoisture Manuka Honey & Mafura Oil Intensive Hydration Shampoo & Conditioner | Set of 2 | 13 fl. Oz. each
Title: Left hair greasy and unmanageable
Review: I purchased this shampoo and conditioner after dying my hair for the first time and getting a keratin treatment.  I was told I should look for something sulfate-free, and this product seemed like a great fit.  Except after 2.5 months of using it, I can confidently say this product RUINED my hair.  I naturally have thick, voluminous hair, and after using this product I would constantly be left with greasy, oily, flaky, unmanageable hair that kept falling and wouldn't calm down.  I could never wear my formerly fun and curly hair down...always tied it up because it was that bad.  I thought for a while that it was because I died my hair and my hair was damaged.  But after finally switching to another product, my problems subsided.  Maybe this shampoo won't affect everyone the same way, but once I switched, I realized that it made my hair the worst it has ever been.

Product: SheaMoisture Manuka Honey & Mafura Oil Intensive Hydration Shampoo & Conditioner | Set of 2 | 13 fl. Oz. each
Title: USED not New
Review: Sorry it has taken me a while to post a review, but both my bottle of shampoo and conditioner were used.  No seal on top of shampoo, plunger in conditioner and around top of bottle had dried conditioner.  BOTH bottles were down by a quarter to a third and you could see the 'squeeze' mark on the shampoo container.  Unfortunately, it is too late for me to return.  Next time I'll look closer before assuming I was delivered a new and unused product.

Product: SheaMoisture Manuka Honey & Mafura Oil Intensive Hydration Shampoo & Conditioner | Set of 2 | 13 fl. Oz. each
Title: Great moisturizer/had a reaction

It kind of had a bitter smell to me and Iâ€™m used to using coconut smelling hair products. I saw one review that said it made their scalp itch a lot and I didnâ€™t think much of it. After I got out of the shower, my scalp was itching a lot like I was having an allergic reaction. So be mindful about that. For the positives, my hair was very soft and moisturized. Due to the scalp irritation, I wonâ€™t be using this product anymore which really bums me out because my hair felt amazing after I used it.

My hair just felt tangly, heavy, and gunky. I loved the smell and it did revive my hair a little, but it felt gross from the film it was leaving.

Title: Great product, be caution of negative reviews

It would help if the people who had issues would identify themselves or their hair type. Black hair absorbs moisture so shampoos geared toward black hair will leave other hair types greasy. This is not the fault of the shampoo. It is designed and works as intended! It left my hair and scalped so moisturized.

Product: SheaMoisture Manuka Honey & Mafura Oil Intensive Hydration Shampoo & Conditioner | Set of 2 | 13 fl. Oz. each
Title: ... this shampoo and conditioner set at Walmart and I LOVE the way it smells
Review: I bought this shampoo and conditioner set at Walmart and I LOVE the way it smells. I have fine textured strait hair but lots of it and it makes it so soft. I can't say enough good things about this brand as it is and you all just wowed me with another great product line.Things to keep in mind if you're a new customer switching over from commercial shampoo brands:Your hair is going to go through a 1-2 week detox period if you're used to using brands like Pantene or Treseme. It might feel heavier at first but pretty soon it will feel normal again and much healthier.If you shampoo, you must condition with the conditioner. I've tried using just the shampoo and my hair doesn't feel right.Make sure you lather and rinse your head thoroughly with both products or you may get a built up feeling. I use a pick to ensure that I've covered my whole head.Hope this helps!

Review: Dry stiff low porosity 4c hair.. Shea moisture intensive hydration shampoo and Conditioner will put the end to all your misery frustration and dread of dealing with crunchy stiff hair .After reading all reviews on these products I decided to have a go ..Both arrived on my wash day so I decided to give them ago ..I can promise you all I felt like crying instantly My hair softened that course wire feeling disappeared and that's just using the shampoo  .The conditioner was more than the icing on the cake my hair actually drank the product and know how difficult that is if you have low porosity hair!!Honestly honestly you won't be disappointed  .if you say they don't work maybe your suffering from product build up so clarify your hair and try again . Shea moisture intensive hydration manuka honey products are the best i will never use anything else as long as they keep to there formula.. I now  have soft springy moisturise sisterlocs .ðŸ˜

Product: SheaMoisture Manuka Honey & Mafura Oil Intensive Hydration Shampoo & Conditioner | Set of 2 | 13 fl. Oz. each
Title: Report abuse
Review: Ok, so I have Mixed race hair and I come from a Spanish, Caribbean background predominantly, but also we have with Chinese, African and German mixed into my Caribbean family, so I have THICK spring coil curly hair - probably around a Type 4 Curly.I was using MIELLE products prior to the "pandemic" and they are Outstanding but were difficult to get a hold of online at the time, so I was apprehensive at first but, finding out SHEA Moisture are black owned and use Natural products boosted my trust in the brand.Im most of the way through the INTENSIVE HYDRATION - MANUKA HONEY set and my hair and scalp have loved all of it. Worst case, if you find the shampoo is stripping every bit of oil out of your hair, you can Add a little almond oil to it but either way, the Conditioner is fantastic in terms of Hair and Scalp treatment.I usually work it from roots, length and ends - tie my hair up - get out the shower - brush my teeth - body lotion, etc - maybe have a quick cuppa - and finally, I gently rinse the conditioner out of my hair and it smells Foopin AMAZING mate!HOWEVER, I found the Pump Cap on the conditioner bottle to be a little faulty - mine kept leaking conditioner after a few presses, but it did continue functioning throughout usage.ADVISE: Always price check this product - it goes up and down in price quite Wildly and it Is available more locally nowadays as well - Boots and Superdrug sell it as well as Black & Asian hair stores - but if the seller keeps a decent price (say Â£20ish) & the (Amazon) free delivery, this is Definitely worth having delivered and Shea Moisture have Loads of other great hair products too.

Title: Report abuse

I have medium thick and waist length hair (Indian ethnicity), not sure if it doesn't suit my hair type but totally disappointed and would never buy this one not recommend this one.
